ProductName: Columbia
Review: First off, I love Columbia products. I think their stuff is every bit as good, and better in some cases, than the higher priced brands that seem to be more fashion focused. That said, I have been harsh towards Columbia in my reviews when need be. I had a different vest of theirs that was so heavy and uncomfortable that it was unwearable and I returned it ASAP. Had still another that was made well, but the sizing was way off and it was far, far too long.Now, about this vest. I love it!I wanted something lighter to wear over flannels or other baselayers and had tried another brand that my wife had purchased for me. It was ok, but I didn't like the way it fit around the chest area and the pockets were a bit odd. I know that sounds nitpicky, but putting your hands in that vest's pockets was awkward due to the angle. As a result I told my wife I was going to order this Columbia vest and see how it worked out.After the Columbia arrived it took me maybe a minute to tell my wife she could return the other vest she had purchased. The Columbia just felt better in the way it fit. It also cost less than half what the other one did and that is always nice as well. The material of this vest is very soft, thus the title of my review, and although it is quite comfortable it seems quite durable as well. The warmth is what you would expect of a light to mid weight vest. I have worn it on some drizzly days outside and it seems to shed water decently as well. Ideally you would wear a rain jacket over it on days that are going to be wet, but I think this vest would do just fine in light rain for a while before it soaked through.I like the vest so much I'm going to order two more in different colors. Great job Columbia!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 30 December 2018

Review: Compre de mi talla pero el tamaño es de una talla superior, la calidad no respalda el precio, solo es la marca
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 7 August 2023

You can't expect it to take you through a snowstorm but the fleece that they use in their vests are soft, modestly warm and feel quality to the touch. My only qualm is that it's a bit long for a vest, but I am quite a short person so I can't say that I didn't expect this, but it still serves its purpose!

ProductName: Columbia
Review: A surprisingly good fit on this lightweight vest.I'm an odd (men's) size somewhere L and XL for most tops, so a lot of things are either tight or baggy. This one (L) is just right for me for outdoor active wear-- fitted but not snug. I could easily wear a couple of tee-shirts or one heavier top underneath. The shoulders come out a little further than I expected (more than they do on the model), so paired with a shorter-sleeved tee may look funny.The material is lightweight (thinner than I expected) but feels warm. This is definitely active-wear or for mildly cool temperatures, it won't keep you warm in frigid temps except as one of multiple layers. A good choice when it's too warm to be active with a long-sleeved jacket, but too cool to skip a heavier layer. For me, this is a hiking vest.Recommended.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 October 2016

ProductName: Columbia
Review: Non mi è piaciuto il fatto che nelle foto c'era il marchio Columbia ricamato sul petto e invece sul prodotto non c'era nulla, Columbia era scritto solo in una etichetta interna. Devo dire che mi puzza un po di fake, mi dispiace perchè se volevo prendere un prodotto anonimo prodotto in Bangladesh probabilmente potevo risparmiare dei soldi. Alla fine comunque il prodotto è discreto, niente di più. Veste piuttosto abbondante, se siete a cavallo di due taglie vi suggerisco di prendere quella più piccola.

Review: This is a good imitation leather jacket for spring and fall and maybe cool summer evenings.  It looks good and is comfortable.  Mine is the dark brown and it looks great.  Collar and cuffs are good.  Very happy with it.  A size-large is just right for me.  I'm 5-10, 200lbs.  Just remember this is really for casual wear.  It's not real leather, so it isn't for real rugged work in harsh conditions in the woods or something like that, and it's not going to be good and tough for a lot of motorcycle or ATV wear or things along those lines.  But if, like me, you're looking for a casual wear leather type jacket at a very good price then this fits the bill.

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Smooth Lamb
Review: I read many reviews to figure out what size I should get and all the reviews helped me decide.My stats are: 6'1" tall; 220# weight; 36-38 waist;  44-46 chest.  I workout so my arms and shoulders are bigger than normal.  I ordered size XL and it all fit great as if it was made for me.  Some jackets I have are either too lengthy than I'd like them to be, too small or tight in the arms and shoulders or just too much room that the jacket hangs down.  But the XL gives just enough room with a shirt inside and the bottom just falls no more than an inch below the waist which is what I want.The quality of the jacket is very impressive.  I have a Bomber jacket (filled) which cost me almost $200 and its a great jacket for winter only.  The collar holds its form well.  Inside lining feels great.  Wear it throughout most of the year except summer.  Versatile to use as dress up or down.My only con is the packaging.  The item is loose in the package and to think that it's leather, regardless of what type, Amazon should at least fold the jacket loosely to a cardboard then the clear plastic bag before placing it in the mailing bag.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 24 September 2018

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Smooth Lamb
Review: Great faux leather jacket!  The style is classic, yet modern, timeless, casual and very cool.  High quality and very well crafted/constructed.I am 5'11", 208lbs, 36" waist, athletic build, jacket size 42R, shirt size 17.5 34/35.  I ordered a size Large and it fits perfectly.The stand up collar adds an distinct edge of coolness, but the jacket is not so trendy that you have to worry about it ever going out of fashion.  While it is a casual jacket it could also easily be worn for a dressier night out too.The soft fabric stretchy waist and cuffs along with the quality lining make it really comfortable.  The same soft fabric also lines the neck so the faux leather doesn't stick or cause your neck to sweat like with other leather and faux-leather jackets where the material touches your skin.There is absolutely no way you can tell it is a faux jacket...none.  It looks and feels just like lambskin leather.  My wife had no clue it was a faux leather jacket until I told her.  She is having me return the $700 real leather jacket I recently bought and keep this quality alternative in it's place...and at 10 times the savings ;)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 8 November 2016

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Smooth Lamb

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Smooth Lamb
Review: This jacket is made of a faux lamb skin, which is a nice supple and soft leather-like material. It flexes, unlike real leather, so it's more comfortable. It's the right weight for a nice fall/spring jacket. It looks good on and the fit is as expected. Remember this is faux leather, so not as tough as the real thing, so don't jump on the motorcycle and think it's going to protect you. For a fashion statement though, it does the job.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 March 2022

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Smooth Lamb
Review: This jacket met or exceeded my expectations. I bought it based on the reviews found here and am not disappointed. Indeed, the finish is almost impossible to determine that it's not real leather, in both feel and appearance. The tag says it is water resistant.I am 6'1", 197 lbs, average build, and ordered the Large size which fits perfectly. Sleeve length is just right, which is always a concern when I'm buying a jacket. It fits snuggly when zipped up and probably wouldn't work well with a heavy sweater -- but that's not the way I'll be using it. It's just a bit heavier than I expected, being faux leather, but not nearly as heavy and bulky as real leather.I don't particularly care for the bright checkered pattern on the inside liner, but it won't be seen by anyone when I'm wearing it.  I would have preferred a dark solid color. However, this in no way detracts from my overall satisfaction with this purchase.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2018

ProductName: Jack & Jones Men's Jjerush Bomber Noos Jacket
Review: Da ich bisher keine einzige "richtige" Übergangsjacke Frühjahr/Herbst hatte, sondern nur Sweatshirtjacken trug, bestellte ich diese Jacke in Größe L. Da ich Größe M habe, wollte ich sicher gehen, dass die Jacke auch nicht zu kurz, eng sitzt. Sie kam ohne viel Verpackungsmüll an. Die Jacke selbst war in Folienverpackung gelegt und das Ganze in einem Papierumschlag. Kein zusätzlicher Karton. Finde ich gut.Die Jacke selbst schaut aus wie angegeben und sitzt perfekt.Die Jacke hat 3 Reißverschlusstaschen. 2 rechts und links unten und 1 Tasche mit Reißverschluss am oberen linken Ärmel. Daneben befinden sich 4 Täschchen, wo man z.B. einen Stift reinstecken kann. Diese Öffnungen sind klein. Die unteren zwei Taschen sind groß genug, um z.Bsp. Schlüsselbund oder ein Handy (Bsp. Samsung A51) leicht zu verstauen. Innentaschen gibt es keine, das ist für mich auch nicht wichtig, da die Außentaschen für mich ausreichend sind.Alles in allem bin ich sehr zufrieden und würde diese Jacke wieder kaufen, z.Bsp. in einer anderen Farbe.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 6 August 2022

ProductName: Jack & Jones Men's Jjerush Bomber Noos Jacket
Review: Die Jacke sieht super aus und entspricht der angegeben Größe. Rundum zufrieden!

ProductName: Jack & Jones Men's Jjerush Bomber Noos Jacket
Review: Da ich momentan sehr auf den Bomberjackenstil abfahre, habe ich beim günstigen Angebot dieser Jacke natürlich gleich zu geschlagen. Ander als bei Bomberjacken von Alpha oder Urban Classic ist diese Jacke nicht aus Nylon, sondern aus Polyester, was der Jacke einen fast samtartigen Stoff verleiht. Auch ist das Jäckchen, recht dünn, ungefüttert, aber mit verstärkter Innenseite und damit perfekt für die Übergangstage Frühling/Herbst geeignet. Eine Innentasche gibt es leider nicht, dafür aber die bombertypische Armtasche mit Reissverschluss am linken Arm.Ich habe diese Jacke im dezenten hellblau, was modisch heraussticht. Lässt sich diese Farbe doch wunderbar mit einem gelben T-Hemd oder grauen Strickpulli kombinieren und wirkt noch dazu wunderbar elegant!Ich kann nur eine bedenkenlose Empfehlung aussprechen. Denkt daran, wenn ihr nicht ganz so schlank seid, lieber eine Nummer Größer zu bestellen, Bomber fallen nunmal recht klein aus. Diese hier passte mir in M aber perfekt bei 178 cm und 65 kg.

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: So this is my 3rd Dickies jacket in this style. I am used to the fit, and knew what to expect when ordering, so there were no surprises here. This is the insulated version, so it is a little warmer than the cheaper non insulated version. Do yourself a favor and choose this one over the non insulated version. The non insulated jacket is no warmer than a thin flannel shirt. This one actually holds in some heat. This is by no means a heavy jacket, however. Im a skinny guy, so I get cold in the 60s and 70s. This jacket provides enough warmth for me down to the 40s. But in the 60s, if I'm working/moving around, it actually gets a bit hot.So, yes it is a "light" jacket, but not so light that it wont do any good in the 40s and 50s. Also it's not too heavy (in my opinion) for temperatures in the 60s.The lining is like a polyester type, very smooth and feels good on the arms. I prefer this to cotton or wool type linings. This is only preference, but just thought you should know, in case you prefer the more cotton type lining.So the fitment is probably what you are most curious about. This style of jacket is short and meant to be more fitted than other jackets. The sleeves come to your wrist (with average arm length). The bottom of the jacket stops at the waist, maybe slightly above depending on your torso length. If you're wearing the correct size jacket, when you move, this jacket may feel "too small" for you. Meaning the sleeves will come above your wrists when stretching your arms, or the bottom will rise above your waist line. You will feel it slightly constricting shoulder movement. If this is what you want, then order the correct size. If you prefer a little more breathing/movement room, then order the next size UP.Just for reference, I'm 5'11" 145 pounds, fairly skinny. I wear a small in most jackets, small-medium t-shirts, small work shirts/uniform shirts. But I don't like baggy shirts and jackets. So a small in this Dickies jacket is perfect for me. If you are about the size of me, and prefer more fitted shirts and jackets, then the small should be good for you. If you like them more baggy, then go with the medium.This theory should work across the spectrum in all the sizes. If you like fitted coats, then get the size you would normally get. If you like them more loose and baggy, then get the next size up.All in all this is a great buy on a very durable jacket. I work on cars for a living so this jacket gets daily use and abuse throughout the fall and winter. Even with all the abuse, I still get a few years out of these jackets. That's not to say they are worn out after a few years, they just get so stained and faded, it's time to get a new one. But at this price point, you could get a couple at a time, and wear them forever.Oh an one more thing. If you're looking at other work jackets on Amazon, you may notice many of them say the proportions are all screwed up...Like oversized arms or torso areas. Weird proportions that make you like Popeye or something. The Dickies jacket IS NOT like that. If you get the correct size, you will not look weird like you may with other brand jackets.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 21 October 2016

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Produit de qualité "Made in China" d'une marque américaine : toile résistante, coupe, coutures et finitions sans aucun reproche.Le zip est en métal.Ce blouson a une doublure synthétique légèrement matelassée, il est lavable en machine à 30° c.Je suis motard et les 2 GROS DÉFAUTS de ce vêtement sont :1°) Aucune poche ne ferme, il aurait été intelligent de mettre un zip aux poches extérieures + un bouton ou un velcro pour l'unique poche intérieure.2°) 1 seule poche intérieure !Insuffisante pour un portefeuille et un  smartphone ! Si c'est dans cette unique poche intérieure cela fait une trop grosse épaisseur.Où mettre ce dernier ? Prendrez-vous le risque  dans l'une des poches extérieures qui ne ferme pas ?Le designer de ce vêtement n'est pas un homme !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 23 September 2018

ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 March 2017

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Compré talla L, mido 1,79 cm, 78-80 kg y me quedo ni muy grande ni muy pequeña, aunque si me quedo un poco corta de la altura del cuerpo, y la longitud del brazo si me quedo muy grande, ojalá tuviera unos botones para ajustar, pero muy cómoda, y excelente materiales, me encanta!!!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 19 January 2021

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Queda guay!

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Robuster Stoff nach außen und leichte aber wirkungsvolle, gesteppte Isolierung innen. Mit einem dünnen Sweater drunter langt die für mich bequem runter bis +5C. Gerader Schnitt mit nicht zu kurzer Körper- und Ärmellänge, zeitlos sportlich.Wasserabweisend, voll waschbar und farbstabil ist sie außerdem, preiswert sowieso, auch zur UVP.Wer eine europäische Passform bevorzugt, sollte eine Nummer kleiner als üblich wählen und wer‘s luftig mit Platz mag, seine übliche Größe, sind eben Ami-Abmessungen.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 17 December 2023

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket

Im 1.83 cm and 90 kilos, muscular build and M hits the sweet spot, and I can still layer a jumper or a hoodie.

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Très bonne veste légèrement doublée poche intérieure pratique. Taille américaine donc grand bras un peu long mais sans excès, idéal pour un gros sweat ou pull en dessous. Il suffit d'aller voir le guide des tailles mais on peut dire qu'une taille en moins que votre taille habituelle.Sinon tiens ses promesses de veste de travail légère résistante et pas cher

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Contento con el producto
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 20 October 2021

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: I am using this jacket when working on a Farm and it is performing very good. Dirt, water*, mud... whatever the jacket is exposed to it can take it protects me well. Also the built quality is very good, nothing seems to tear or rip even when the fabric gets stressed. (*When it comes to water it protects, but it still also absorbs the water, so the jacket is not really fully water repellent, it still needs to dry off if it got really "soaked" in water). When it comes to sizing, I am almost 6ft. tall and chubby, so the 2XL size option is the one for me. The jacket sits just a tiny bit lose this way, but for me that is very comfortable.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 2 October 2022

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Me gusta el diseño es ancho de mangas pedí s y he acertado

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: Classic design and built to last. The fit is on point. Amazon recommended a small, but I went with a medium. I think a small one would have been too snug. I was initially worried that the sleeves would be too long/big, but the length and size are just right. The sleeves rest slightly below my wrist but do not cover my whole hand. For reference, I am about 6'0 and weigh about 160-165, average build.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

ProductName: Dickies Men's Insulated Eisenhower Jacket
Review: La calidad del textil se ve buena, una tela bastante gruesa y resistente, ademas que el color luce bien, la desventaja que le vi es que las mangas son bastante anchas y que los puños (donde termina la manga) quedan algo grandes.

ProductName: Helly Hansen Men's Daybreaker Versatile Fleece Jacket
Review: HElly Hansen es una gran firma de ropa deportiva, con tejidos de calidad.Sin embargo, no esperes una maravilla en este modelo de chaleco. Decidi comprarlo porque lo conocia, pero no me esperaba lo mala que es la cremallera y lo mal diseñados que estan los bolsillos. SOlo dispone de los laterales de mano, con cremallera, y de dos interiores algo más grandes. El gran problema es que ambos coinciden en altura a la altura de la cintura, y como el tejido es poco rigido, se deformará quedando rarisimo.Por algo mas de precio tienes un modelo de polar con acabado rígido y aspecto de neopreno que si que esta bien.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 24 December 2018

ProductName: Helly Hansen Men's Daybreaker Versatile Fleece Jacket
Review: This vest is mostly as advertised. I am 5'10" 200lbs and ordered an XL.The pockets' inner mesh is not as warm as fleece lined pockets but still keeps hands warm enough. The zipper is somehow really easy to use yet still doesn't unzip, and has no sharp edges. The collar is super soft with the zip all the way up and does not catch my scruffy beard.I suspected it would be a "slim fit" which is why I ordered an XL. The armpit holes are a little tight but not too much. I think the vest would have been too tight if I got just a Large.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 November 2023

ProductName: Helly Hansen Men's Daybreaker Versatile Fleece Jacket
Review: Nice and light weight but warm, perfect for adding another layer. Very comfortable and looks great too.Very happy with this purchase.

Review: Nice enough vest which will perform adequately, but two warnings .......The vest is very thin, (very little filling) so I would say suitable for mildly cool days only.Also this is not a normal or slim fit, but generous in sizing, so you can wear over thick jumpers..It would be helpful when ordering if the description included "RELAXED FIT" as per the attached label.

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: Chaleco delgado, calentito y de uso rudo. Hace poco conocí esta marca y me han gustado mucho sus productos, son costosos, posiblemente el doble o triple de lo que cuesta un chaleco similar en marca X, pero este chaleco se nota me va a durar muuuchos años.El año pasado compré un chaleco columbia muy similar tanto en estilo, prestaciones y precio, el columbia me salió muy bueno pero comparando con el carhartt me quedo con este, el material se ve mucho más resistente, repelente al agua y algo q es un plus para mi es que es 2 o 3 cm más corto,  no me gustan los chalecos largos.Mido 170cm peso 92kg el mediano me queda un poquito apretado, pero me da justo chance de traer una camisa de franela o polar delgada abajo del chaleco.Lo compré a muy buen precio ($1,097)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 26 June 2021

Review: Una M me queda perfecta, la L suele ser mi talla

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: Die Weste ist geil! Leider habe ich sie mir erst in M bestellt und war hin und hergerissen ob sie mir passt oder zu groß ist. Ich habe sie dann umgetauscht (Vorsicht und beachten, die rücksende kosten musste ich selbst tragen.  Ein direkter Umtausch wurde mir nicht angeboten. Dadurch habe ich bei der neubestellung 2 €mehr gezahlt + die Rücksendung.) Als ich sie dann in S anprobiert habe dachte ich kurz sie wäre evtl. doch zu klein. Aber nein sie ist slim und passt perfekt. Da zu sieht sie gut aus und ist praktisch. Die Taschen sind gut plaziert und über all vorhanden. Brust Seiten und Innentasche. Top! Eindeutig eine Kauf Empfehlung. Allerdings ist es keine Weste für extreme Arbeitsbelastung oder um sich durch Büsche und dornenstreucher zu bewegen ;)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 9 April 2021

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: This is a great Carhartt vest.  It is a large and I am 6'1" / 185 lbs and it fits just right over a sweatshirt.  Anyone bigger would probably need the XL.  Also it has pulls to tighten the bottom at waist to keep wind out.  Two zipper pockets - one on outside and one on inside.  Also velcro pocket on inside.Carhartt makes great clothing.  Almost everything I wear is from them.

Sehr angenehm zu tragen es zieht nicht durch hat einen guten Abschluss am Kragen der nicht am Hals stört. Desweiteren kann man am Jackenbund seitlich die weiter einstellen. ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: I bought this vest for my husband for Christmas. The vest fits nicely, except it kicks out at the bottom in the back when he wears it. (That's what I dislike the most.) Most of his problems with the vest involve the openings to the pockets which are hard for him to get into if there is anything in his hand to put into the pocket. I think the openings are a little small for a larger man. He says the fabric is a little slick!  (I fear all remarks are tainted by his previous vest, which he liked very much and left somewhere. Next year I will get him sticks!)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 8 February 2024

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: This is a great jacket, and a 8/10 design but it's lacking in the most necessary feature. I ended up buying the 5.11 version instead because it was extremely lightweight, rolls up into a ball and yet probably 4x warmer. However, this jacket had the better pockets, and arguably I like the horizontal stitching look better. Make the arms have a nice sinch mechanism, and use the special insulation in the 5.11 jacket and I think you'll be on top. The neck fabric is a little rough. I'd prefer a Sherpa or maybe micro rabbit hair feel, but it's not a deal breaker. Also, keep the XLT sizing please, extra cost isn't an issue, for whatever reason all men's clothing is either for a 1950s man, or women these days and never fits right. The XLT is about the same length as the default 5.11 XL.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 January 2024

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Vest
Review: Bought this for my husband, based on reviews, I ordered a medium. Wish I would have gotten him a large, he would have preferred it to.Looks nice and well made.

ProductName: Champion Men's Packable Jacket
Review: Have been looking for a lightweight rain jacket for golf at a reasonable price.  Tried a couple of more expensive ones and wasn't real happy with them, it seems you either get lightweight or only water resistant, not waterproof.  This one advertises water resistant but I was impressed with the material and expect it will hold up to a decent downpour.  I have not had a chance to test it yet but the fabric is better than what I was expecting.  I am normally a medium size for most things but ordered a large for this given I will use it for golf and the fit is great.  It is lightweight and does not restrict movement.  Not a fan of the brand logo on the chest but if all goes well I will only wear it a few times a year.

ProductName: Champion Men's Packable Jacket
Review: I bought this jacket for my 14 years old son.  He has worn it throughout fall 2020 and is already wearing it again this spring (April 2021).  It is lightweight and very well-made.  It has 2 regular side pockets in the waist area as well as a large zippered front pocket in which the jacket can be folded into.  When wearing the jacket, this extra large pocket is very practical for storing your keys, cellphone, earbuds, and any other personal items.  Even though the fabric is thin, it keeps you warm during cooler windy days.  The quality is good as we have had no issues at all with the fabric ripping.It fits my son nicely and has a little extra space which is great since he can easily wear layers underneath.  It is adjustable at the waist and it is wind and rain repellent.  The hood is also a nice touch and helps keep him dry when he is out and about.  It's stylish, comfortable and the fact that it can be neatly folded into a compact little pouch is definitely a plus.  Great purchase.  Would recommend.If my review was helpful let me know by clicking on the ''Helpful'' button :) 👍🏻
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 12 April 2021

ProductName: Champion Men's Packable Jacket
Review: Cette veste pliable Champion pour homme offre une combinaison idéale de praticité et de protection contre les intempéries. Son design imperméable vous permet de rester au sec même sous la pluie légère ou modérée, tandis que sa fonction pliable permet de la ranger facilement lorsqu'elle n'est pas utilisée. Légère et confortable, elle constitue un choix idéal pour les activités de plein air telles que la randonnée, le camping ou la course à pied. En outre, le logo Champion ajoute une touche de style sportif à votre tenue. En résumé, cette veste pliable offre une solution pratique et polyvalente pour faire face aux caprices de la météo. N'est pas slim fit alors ne pas prendre une taille plus grande.

ProductName: Leatherick Men's Real Leather Waistcoat Vest Black - Biker Style Casual Fashion
Review: Ich bin 176 cm groß und wiege 80 kg (kräftig aber nicht dick). Beeinflusst von den Rezessionen habe ich die Größe XL bestellt (normal L).  Die Jacke war mir zu groß. Höchstens tragbar mit gefütterten Holzfällerhemd.Die Rücksendung mit Amazon QR-Code war Kundenfreundlich, problemlos. Der Händler hat mir umgehend den Erhalt und eine Gutschrift bestätigt.Da die Weste eine sehr gute Leder- und Verarbeitungsqualität hat habe ich sie mir nochmal in Größe L bestellt. Die Zusendung erfolgte zügig und meine Qualitätserwartung wurde nicht enttäuscht. L passt mir, mit normalen Hemd oder T-Shirt, bestens.Die Westenlänge reicht bis zum Hosenbund. Genauso möchte ich den Schnitt. Die Druckknöpfe schließen fest. Das Leder ist kräftig, dadurch wirkt die Weste etwas steif, genauso wie ich es möchte.Fazit: Richtig bestellt (Größe) hat man eine Lederweste an der man viele Jahre Freude hat. Kaufempfehlung!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 17 November 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: I am giving this FIVE stars  because I really like this jacket and the shipping was extremely fast . ---- I did have a couple of concerns though . The first -- I am a pretty big guy . 6 ft tall -- 240 pounds . I was not quite sure of what size to order cause just like everybody else - I hate returning something . Just a hassle !! --- So I followed the size chart and read all the reviews .( I wish that some other folks would of shared with us what their height and weight were in these reviews) . -- Anyway -- My chest is between a size 48 and 50 . -- I settled on the size XL in this jacket . After it arrived I tried it on and it looks great ( without buttoning up ) . When I do button up the jacket , it is very relaxed in the front . I have a nice size gut as well but you would never know wearing this jacket . Plenty of room for a hoodie or thermals or flannels . --- Now -- I don't know if I like that ?!?! I don't want to wear a hooded jacket underneath because I don't think that will look right . If it was a plain collar than yes . But the collar is sherpa-like and that I wouldn't want to obstruct the jackets collar . Does that make any sense ??? -- Another concern of mine was the quality of the denim . ---- I remember having this jacket when i was in my teens ( 3 decades ago ) - and for some reason that jacket seemed a heck of a lot thicker . This denim seems thin . --- OH-- I did wash and dry the day I received it ( I wanted to actually try and shrink it a little ). I don't think it shrunk at all . ( I couldn't tell because the front still seemed big  in the gut area ) . ---- I still like the jacket overall .  The price is good as well . If the denim was thicker no doubt this jacket would be selling for $100 some odd dollars , right ?---
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 22 October 2015

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: Fits well and keeps you warm
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 4 November 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: I had high hopes for this being a Wrangler jacket, but it fell short of what I was hoping for even after reading the description, checking the size chart, and reading reviews.It's much lighter weight than I thought, but will surely keep me warm.I was hoping for a stiffer denim but this pas been pre-washed and feels more like a shirt material than a more rigid denim.I purchased a Large and the chest is baggier than shown in the size chart and the sleeves are shorter than I hoped. The sleeves will surely shrink to too short if I ever put it in the dryer.I'm debating whether to return it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 21 September 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: I've had both sherpa jackets. The denim/sherpa is a heavy weight denim and thicker sherpa. The sherpa/denim is thinner denim and sherpa. Very different jackets. Order carefully.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 24 August 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: The jacket is great, but Amazon really let us down this time.  First, the jacket: it fit well (xl for someone who normally wears that size) and is much closer in weight and styling to the very old favorite one being replaced than we expected.  Like the old one, it has sizing buttons on the waist, one good open interior chest pocket, and good side pockets.  The outer chest pockets are much smaller in both width and height (just barely wide enough for a smart phone but not tall enough to close over one) and have sturdy snaps instead of buttons - we'll see how these hold up.  The sleeves have one snap instead of a button.  I would give 5 stars if the chest pockets weren't so small.Now for Amazon:  we ordered this jacket prime for a particular need and it took SIX calendar days to get here.  What?  Normally our items (and we order a lot) come UPS and arrive like clockwork.  Happy customer.  This one came FedEx and the tracking notes are very interesting, starting with "Processed by shipper and loaded in trailer said to contain package".  Then the regular status continues showing it took 6 days, including going from California to Portland and then back to us in Southern Oregon.  We don't know if the fault was Amazon's or FedEx's, but either way, what is the remedy for this failure of service for our prime membership?  Either way, Amazon, please go back to using UPS!!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 24 January 2016

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: Bought this to replace my husband's previous wrangler jacket that he got paint all over, same jacket, bought about within a year of eachother, same size, but when actually measured and worn... It's a few inches smaller. Hopefully it streches out...
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 13 December 2022

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: I got this for my father who has 2 of these type of jackets in older versions. He needed this jacket in a LONGER length to cover his backside in the cold because these sherpa jean jackets are always so short, usually to the waist, which he has now, but he froze a bit in the bitter cold! This jacket has some length. He would have liked the sherpa lining to be a bit thicker but it is ok. This product seems to run bigger, which is fine because you need room in the arms to wear sweaters underneath the jacket, but I had no real idea how to gauge the size properly and returned it twice until I got him the right fit. His old ones were XL but he took a MEDIUM in this version. It has fashionable brown courdoroy trims behind the collar and on the inner cuffs ( so you can flip up the cuffs) and the cuffs have snaps, which is good. The bottom of the jacket has adjustable tab buttons on each side to make the hem have a tighter fit if you want..The jacket has metal jean buttons -- I hope the binding on the buttonholes holds up. The jean finish is softer and jacket has alot of great stitching detail. The color is a good darker to mid- blue. Maybe I will get one myself!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 April 2015

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: Quality out the ying yang.  Arrived in pristine condition and packaged at the factory.  Had NOT been triedon and played around with ( other words sent back by somebody ).  This was a plus.  This jacket is made justlike the Wrangler jeans,  tough and durable.  The stitching is perfect,  craftsmanship immaculate .This jacket is heavy duty and very warm when the temp is in the 20's.  I cannot find any fault with this nicejacket.  If I could,  I would tell you.  If you like Wrangler jeans,  you'll like this.  The fit,  perfect.  Order thesize that you use.  This jacket is exactly as described and more.  I'm telling you,  this jacket is none lessthan 100% quality.  The buttons are metal and are put on tight.  Again,  nothing wrong with this jacket.Worth the asking price.  The lining inside the jacket is put in right,  no sagging,  sleeves and all.  It will fitwith comfort over a thick flannel winter shirt,  also machine washable just like the jeans,  with noshrinkage...
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2018

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rustic Sherpa Lined Jacket
Review: I like the more uniformly shaded, deep blue denim on this version. It isn't as thick/heavy as the Levi's sherpa jean jackets but has a much more distinctive western look. The fit is old school, somewhat boxy and not form fitting in the least. Be careful - the version on the Wrangler website is similar in color but a more "modern" cut. It uses much less material and is tighter - I sent that one back and got this more traditional cut jacket. Very happy with it - only complaint is I wish it had snaps instead of buttons. Makes it take a lot more time to get on and off. Buy your normal jacket size.

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket
Review: the Tommy Hilfiger men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket and I am extremely impressed with its performance. The lightweight design makes it easy to wear, while still offering excellent protection against wind and rain. I was pleased to find that the jacket fits true to size and was comfortable to wear throughout the day.The adjustable hood is a great feature, although I do wish it was a bit larger to offer more protection during heavy storms. However, the zipper goes up high enough to keep my neck and chest dry even in harsh weather conditions.I appreciated the minimal branding on the jacket, as it allowed me to wear it with a variety of outfits. The blue color was true to the picture, and I received several compliments on the stylish design.One thing to note is that the jacket does make some noise due to the waterproof material. However, I found this to be a minor issue considering how well it performed in keeping me dry.Overall, I highly recommend the Tommy Hilfiger men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket to anyone in need of a reliable rain jacket. It offers excellent protection and style, with only minor drawbacks that do not detract from its overall quality.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 5 May 2023

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket
Review: This rain jacket / windbreaker is great. It's lightweight, yet blocks just about all the wind and water. Fits perfectly, and matches the measurements listed. The hood could stand to be a little bit larger to help against really bad storms, and I wish it was detachable too. The zipper goes up high enough for dealing with bad storms. I like how minimal the brand logo is. The jacket is really stylish, only hampered by the amount of noise it makes. It's to be expected with a waterproof jacket, but it's still annoying.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 21 November 2020

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket
Review: Good product .
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 19 January 2024

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Waterproof Breathable Hooded Jacket
Review: This jacket is a bargain. The fit was pretty good (not perfect), but at it's most important job which was keeping me dry on a rainy day - it worked great!I was travelling and planned to do a lot of stuff outdoors. I wanted something in case we had a rainy day and sure enough...one day had a persistent steady rain. Although we decided to end the day early, I wore the jacket close to two hours in the rain and the darn thing kept me completely dry. Not a worry at all.The hoodie kept my head dry and the rain just fell right off the jacket like nobody's business. This was without an umbrella in a light to medium steady rain. I do think in a downpour, it might struggle to keep a person dry...but come on. Let's not have unrealistic expectations. I don't think much of anything will keep a person dry in a deluge.I can't think of a negative...unless you expect it to keep you warm. This is a rain jacket. If it's cool/cold, you need to wear thermals or something warm underneath. All in all, to get a name brand jacket that looks good, is comfy, and keeps you dry at this price is a bargain!Great job TH!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 October 2022

Review: Cette fois, j'ai commandé la bonne taille, soit L, alors que je m'habille habituellement en XL. Il faut donc suivre les recommandations concernant les hauts de la marque Carhartt, qui taillent grand, et, en général, choisir une taille en dessous de sa taille.Ceci dit, ce blouson est d'une qualité exceptionnelle (ce qui est un critère récurrent de cette marque), tant sur les matières (extérieur et intérieur), les finitions (coutures), l'alliance parfaite de la légèreté et de la protection contre le froid, les détails pratiques (poches, réglage des bas de manche), la coupe et le style.Ca mérite bien 5 étoiles

Review: I'm 5'11" 220 lbs 46" chest, the large fits like it was tailored for me. The quality is very good especially the stitching and I am very happy with the jacket. This is the third item from  Carhartt I have. I recommend this jacket for anyone who wants a solid product made for a working man.

Review: I searched for a long time for a winter coat (like the puffers that are popular today) that had an outside chest pocket for a phone. Very nice, lightweight, but is basically like a very warm windbreaker. I returned it with regrets.

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Jacket
Review: This is exactly what I wanted in a jacket.  Light weight, rain resistant.  Wind proof.It contains body heat well and generates it's own heat.  For me, it replaced a much heavier jacket that was dated.Only criticism is that it is not a true black, as shown in the photos.  It has a dark blue/grey hue to it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2021

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Jacket
Review: This jacket is light but keeps my boyfriend warm in OR winter.  Easy to move in this jacket despite of his belly inside the jacket! ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 3 February 2021

ProductName: Carhartt Men's Gilliam Jacket
Review: I'm a large medium. This fit perfect. The nylon seems a little thicker than most of these stuffed jackets. It's triple stitched in most places.The blue is a shade or two darker than the photo. I was pleased with it though. The chest pocket is so deep I can practically scratch my back. It has the "inside out" zipper I don't know why everyone doesn't do this. Ive worn this is the 20-30s and its been excellent with a long sleeve t underneath. For me, it's too hot in the 40's, but that's hoodie weather for me.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2018

ProductName: Legendary Whitetails Men's
Review: De bonne qualité et très confortable.  Je mesure 5'10 pour 185livres.  J'ai opté pour un medium et je suis un peu juste et les bras sont légèrement courts  J'avais bien calculé et vérifié le guide de grandeur du fabriquant; j'arrivais exactement entre medium et large.  Je suis toujours entre 2 tailles.  Je ne pourrais pas porter un gros chandail en dessous. Ceci étant dit, je considère que c'est un bon achat.

ProductName: Legendary Whitetails Men's
Review: Prepare to re-sew the buttons on almost immediately.  That is the ONLY downside.This jacket it toasty warm, sized larger than usual, and chicks dig the color.  Best lightweight jacket I have had in a long, long time.  LOVE the quilted poly lining.  It can get HOT!  Beware.  Love the stringed hood.  Love the flip-up collar.  Love the double seal capability of liner zipper+ shirt buttons.  All of this makes for a fairly wide range of comfortable temperatures.  I have worn it in 20F, windy weather, with no other over-coat and been fine.I am 6'4", 400lbs, bought a 4XLT, and can fit a polo and even another LWT flannel under this. PERFECTLY fitted!Please, please, manu more in 4XLT!  I've already bought them out on Amazon, then on the LWT website.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 January 2022

ProductName: Legendary Whitetails Men's
Review: Wore this on a recent trip to the Northwoods in October.  It fit well, it was warm on chilly mornings( Temps in the 30s Fahrenheit) and it held up to me working in the woods cutting and splitting logs.  I will buy another one in a different color.  Size fit perfectly.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 29 October 2023

ProductName: Legendary Whitetails Men's
Review: This was a Christmas gift from my wife.  Oh, I dig this bad boy.  I'm 6'5" with 37" sleeves.  in XLT, I love everything about this hoodie.  It looks freakin' awesome and fits even better (and is warm).  I'm usually that guy who can't  find or afford what will fit right.  As a result, I usually end up with an XL or XXL that still has short sleeves and too much or too little girth depending on the make.  Yes, this is pricey, but it fits perfect and is made really well.  It's always exciting when you find that "thing" that you know will become your new "go-to" item.  This hoodie is that for me.  I might try to save up and get the one in green eventually!  Thanks Legendary Whitetails!  Keep making stuff in Large and Tall sizes and  you'll have a loyal customer in me.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 January 2021

ProductName: Legendary Whitetails Men's
Review: There's nothing I dislike about this flannel.  It's comfortable,  moves with you,  doesn't bind up in your arms.  It's pretty warm.  I say thru a high school football game and was warm,  other than my hands since I did not wear gloves.  Not really sure about the other reviews,  but the size runs accordingly.  Mine is 2xl and I'm a bigger guy,  beer belly,  250lbs.One review speaks of poor stitching.  That was resolved.  There's two lines of stitching down both the button side,  and the hole side.Only thing I might recommend is a zipper on the hand pockets.  They seem a bit shallow,  and it feels like your phone will slip out on you without you knowing when you sit down.The two chest pockets are just a bit shallow as to you can't pull the pocket flap over your phone and button it. (Samsung S20+)I wear it everywhere and get compliments on its style.One of my two favorite "go-to's" when heading out the door.  My second favorite is my carthartt Hoodie.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2021

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket
Review: Supposée être faite pour les grands (XL Tall) cette veste est très mal taillée .Les dimensions sont  :1 - soit excessives :. Tour de taille : 120 cm. Tour de poitrine : 134 cm2 - soit insuffisantes :. Longueur de manches (de couture d’épaule à l’extrémité) : 65 cm. largeur d’épaules (de couture à couture) : 55 cmDes dimensions qui conviendraient plutôt aux hommes forts, mais pas pour mes 197cm et 97kg.En prenant une taille au dessus j’aurais peut-être des manches et des épaules convenables, mais le buste serait très largement surdimensionné.La qualité du tissu laisse aussi franchement à désirer. Très souple et vraiment léger ; on dirait que la veste a déjà été portée (multiple points d'usure) . Je m’attendais à un tissu plus lourd et plus rigide.Décevant pour du Wrangler.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 15 December 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket
Review: A is offering discounts on some sizes, but caution is needed to avoid a mistake.  My husband makes this review:*  I am 6' 0" tall; 215 #; chest 44"; waist 39"*  XL fits very, very well.  This is a "waist jacket", and I am old enough to call it an "Ike" or "Eisenhower jacket"*  The fit is flattering; but there is space available for a medium sweater.*  I typically wear a size 16 1/2 neck and a 34" sleeve--I have some welcome space at the neck and the sleeve extends about 1-1 1/2" below my wrists--I like this a lot*  I wanted the lighter color, BUT I saved about $15 with the darker.*  Reading reviews here, I DID wash it the first time with 1/4 cup salt and 1/2 cup vinegar--I believe the suggestion was made for purposes of "fixing" the color.  [Warm wash and cold rinse.]*  Post-wash girth and length remained the same.*  NO SMELL, PRE-WASH or POST-WASH.*  "Fit and finish" was very good; no defects of any kind seen; fabric quality is sturdy.*  I find it a handsome and useful weight/size.  I live in the Central Cal. desert, so we do not see much cold, even in Winter.I expect many years of use for this garment.  At current 30% off, this is a COMPELLING bargain.[Sorry, I do not take photos.]
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 9 September 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket
Review: This jacket is very well-made, it looks great and it fits great too.  I'm a big guy, and it is difficult to find a jacket that doesn't bind around my shoulders or have cuffs that slide up to my elbows when I raise my arms over my head.  This jacket feels great and the cuffs are where they should be when I ride my motorcycle.  I paid $38.00 and I couldn't be happier.  This jacket would be a deal at 3 times the price.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 28 December 2012

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket
Review: Inexpensive, quality goods. What I've come to expect from Wrangler. Fit nice. A little short in the torso due to my gut though... gotta lay off the wobbly pops.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 2 April 2019

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket
Review: I purchased the Antique Indigo color.  I am 6'4", 210#, 45/46" chest, 40" waist and 37" sleeve length.  Size XL Tall fits me perfectly.  In my humble opinion this Wrangler Denim jacket is the best out there for the price.  I liked it so much, I went back and ordered a second jacket in case Wrangler discontinued this style.  It's that nice of a denim jacket.  In comparison, the CINCH button denim jacket sells for about $100 plus tax and shipping.  This jacket is half that price.  I have both the CINCH denim jacket and the Wrangler Denim Jacket.  The Wrangler jacket is much better quality and fit than the CINCH version.  I read most all of the reviews and have to say the Wrangler jacket I received was virtually flawless.  The stitching, metal buttons, button holes, fit, fabric and workmanship was perfect.  I would not have purchased two if I did not like this jacket.  I hope the one you receive is just as good as the two I received.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 30 November 2023

ProductName: Wrangler Men's Rugged Wear Unlined Denim Jacket

I'm hoping this trend towards sleeve cuffs without anything to keep them in the correct place will disappear. It only works well for people with long arms.

Review: Bought for my father for Christmas. Cut is identical to my own, just a larger size. I bought him a 5XL so it's comfy.The fleece is super soft, and cuts the cold wind nicely. It's perfect in colder dry weather with a layer or two underneath. Plenty of room throughout the shoulders and stomach. Obviously it's not waterproof, but it'll definitely keep you warm if used as a layer.

The blue color looks very good.  There's a drawstring at the bottom that helps to keep out the cold on a blustery day.  Covers the neck well, zips up high.

Suavecita, cómoda, no es para frío excesivo, pero sí te servirá en un otoño frío o un invierno un poco más leve. La talla está perfecta, pedí 4x y 4x es, con comodidad. La calidad es altísima, en especial considerando que está muy barata! Altamente recomendada!!

ProductName: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0
Review: It was a medium weight fleece jacket.  It was soft and comfortable.  It is in high quality built. It fits my outer jacket of L size well and gives additional warm in cold weather.  Even though it is an M size, it is considered as a loose fit one.  Well recommended in terms of value for money.

Review: Muy buen forro polar para realizar cualquier actividad de movimiento que requiera de abrigarse.Mido 1,81 con complexión fuerte pesando entorno a 85kg 6 cogiendo la XL me queda overside y muy bien la verdad sin estar ajustado

Review: I like the look and feel of this jacket.  It fits perfectly and is nice and warm.  The only dislike of the jacket is the zippers on the pocket they seem to grab fabric pretty easily.  Other than that I would recommend this jack for a Spring or Fall jacket or 20+ degree days in the Winter.

ProductName: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I am 5 foot 9" or 175cm average build and height but the arms on this jacket are about 10 cm too short. Very disappointing.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Australia on 31 May 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Not only are they a good quality rain suit the sizing was great allowing for another layer of clothes.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 26 August 2020

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Mejor de lo que esperaba
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 7 October 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Fully tested in Alaska trip.  Handled rain like a champ.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 4 June 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: il pourrait avoir plus de stokage intégré à l'intérieur (filet/poche/téléphone)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 13 September 2020

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Have worn this jacket on 4 or 5 occasions when the rain could be described as torrential, it has remained totally waterproof, it has a good selection of pockets and the sleeves have inner and outer Velcro cuff closures, there are a number of D rings to use , the hood is attached with a zip and works well when in use but feels odd when down. Now  to sizing which is the strangest I have come across , I am a 40 inch chest which in the UK and Europe is medium, I ordered a medium and disappeared inside this jacket, I then ordered a small which is still very baggy on me, when I looked at the size chart the USA small is a 46 inch chest and medium is a 48 inch chest,mystery solved! Be aware of this issue and order accordingly, to summarise its a great waterproof jacket and highly recommended
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2024

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Just used the Frogg Togg's mens jacket with their bib on a week long sail excursion(s) on the Kenai Fjords out of Seward, Alaska where it was cloudy, windy, cold and rainy the entire time.  Very light weight, and easy to slip on and off.  Material is very durable and kept me dry.  The pockets were well placed and came in handy to keep items like glasses, sunscreen, and my "Relief Band" motion bracelet safely stowed.  I even put my wallet in one of the pockets, which was also kept dry.  When not in use the the rain gear stows away where is doesn't take up much space (think military poncho liner).  The hood of the jacket was the weakest link of the jacket.  The hood attached to the jacket with a zipper.  The hood would easily unzip itself (detaching from the jacket), and it is kind of a hassle to zip it back up while on a rolling sailboat while wearing a PFD.  And, I found it difficult to zip it back while wearing gloves.  When using the hood, I did not like how it restricted my field of vision, but you get used to that.  Better to keep warm/dry with a limited field of vision than be wet, cold, and miserable.  It does keep your head dry with enough room to wear a knit cap.  The jacket fit was loose enough to wear layers of warm clothing underneath as this rain suit will not keep you warm, but will shield you from the cold winds.  The jacket did not impede movement or flexibility for the operation of a pitching and rolling sailboat.  Highly recommended.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Jacket showed up and was as described. However, the jacket reeked. At first we thought weed/marijuana from shipping. So we washed it (thus tag removal) only to find out it was worse. Probably skunk.We have washed the jacket, soaked it and have been airing it out for 3 weeks.So jacket would be great IF I could wear it. No issues with Frogg Toggs but the seller must have known the issues.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 7 November 2020

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Awesome rain jacket. Keeps me dry in down pours
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 29 June 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: This is a great jacket for wet weather fishing. It's comfortable and fits well. I ordered the 2XL and it fits well with layers underneath. Only things I would change on the Pilot 2 would be:1: a hood that has a better locking zipper.2: Neoprene inner cuffs with elastic rather than straps. The straps are awkward to get at once the jacket is on.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 23 November 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I heavily researched rain gear before deciding to pull the trigger on Frogg Toggs Pilot.  I purchased the jacket and bibs.  This is rain gear that has a waterproof rating superior to suits costing hundreds of dollars more.  It's not meant to keep you warm like a coat (if you need warmth, buy the liner for the jacket) but it will keep you dry and keep the wind off you.  My only reluctance to purchasing it was the sizing chart on the Frogg Toggs web site; using their sizing chart, I could wear small bibs and a medium jacket.  I'm six feet and weigh 230 pounds.  I wear size 36 waist pants and have a 47 inch chest.  I purchased the "Large" bibs and the "Extra Large" jacket; the fit is perfect.  This rain gear is rugged, however it is not quiet. I purchased it for fishing and other outdoor activities not related to hunting.  If you want "quiet", spend the extra bucks and buy gortex lined soft silent fabric.  Don't confuse this rain gear with Frogg Toggs inexpensive gear that feels like "tyvek"; this is real rain gear that will last for several years.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 22 February 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Not made for Canadian Summer Rain.Water got through the Jacket. My arms where completely wet up to my elbows.Wasn’t warm in temperatures around 15c.Paid way to much for this jacket.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 24 June 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Me gusto que no se siente uno protegido, me llego el producto en la semana de lluvias y me encanto la tela de gran calidad
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 16 September 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Sucks zipper was broke  when received. Sent a few pictures and complaints with NO resolution
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 27 December 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: This is a perfect wind/rain jacket. It's very durable and I love the highlighted zippered waterproof pockets. I gave the jacket overall 5 stars but I do have one gripe and that's the hood. The hood just kind of flaps and hangs there and after a while, it begins to unzip itself.  My biggest concern is that I might lose the hood and I'm afraid if I take it off to store it that I might miss place or lose it. I have seen other rain /wind jackets with a better design and wish that a little more effort was put into that aspect of the jacket.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 4 October 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: The quality is awesome. Fits well and goes nicely with my frogg togg boots and waders. If you are going to tear something, might as well be a $200 value instead of $500 Orvis or Simms. I also ordered a medium. And those waders. I’m not friendly. I break trail and have wiped out and down rockslides a few times. Nothing. No damage. And dry feet after an 8 hour -7celcius wind chill. My wife says “ you’re crazy”.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 13 May 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: The jacket is nice overall. The option of the insulated jacket or vest is handy and makes the jacket that much more versatile. It's light enough for a summer rain jacket that is very windproof and with the additional insulation option im comfortably wearing it fishing tournaments in November here in Michigan still with just a shirt and hoodie underneath. My only complains are the hood and the sleeves. The sleeves seen short at times like reaching down into livewells. They pull up my arms and I bend down and reach. For me it's almost a bonus but not everyone is going to appreciate that. The hook has a nice zipper for removal but the hook doesn't have its own pocket to roll up in or anything, it just detaches with a quality zipper and you do what you wish after that.I found the jacket here for a great price and I'm totally happy with it for that price ($80 or so). However full price would make me a little less impressed. I do like it as much or more than the Huk tournament jacket it replaced.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 6 November 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: This is a great jacket, using it for mostly ATVing. Windproof and waterproof. My only comment is the sleeves are a bit short, which coming from me , is unusual. As most of the time I have to go up one size,  to fit my shoulders, but usually big everywhere else.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 9 May 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I love this thing!  It fits well over a jacket, but is also adjustable to fit without a jacket.  I've had several chances to wear it already.  I teach the motorcycle course, and we've been having many rainy days.  The hand-warmer pockets are a godsend when the rain and wind chill the air.  The hood is nice as well, and covers my head even if I still have my Tilley hat on.  This jacket is definitely worth the money.  I also bought the bib pants, and they are awesome, too.  The side pouches hold my teaching materials, so I don't have to worry about where I'm going to put them, as I did with my other rain pants.  I'm 5'11", 215 pounds, bought both in large, and they both fit very well, once you get it adjusted to your size.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 17 May 2018

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: First of all, I am 6’ 210lbs and I ordered the LARGE. I also ordered the Matching  LARGE bib pants. I think the length and fitment of this jacket is great. It’s not a fitted jacket so there is some bulk in the arms and the chest for layering which for me is great. I fish year round so layering is key to warmth. This jacket allows just that.There are lots of great features to the jacket and many pockets. My only gripe is the hood will just flap around on you if it’s not velcroed. Together around the chin area. It can be zipped off but then where do I put it?I’m. A handy guy so I’ll probably modify it somehow with some Velcro or something.—— update, I used some Velcro and double sided carpet tape (very sticky) and affixed a Velcro tab on each side of the hood hear the collar to keep it from flapping everywhere when not Velcro’d around my chin. Works very well and was super easy to do.Great jacket and pants, I’m really excited to stay warm and dry this season.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 15 January 2020

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Excellent fit, build and thoughtful design.  This has waterproof pockets galore both in and outside the main coat zipper.  Seams are all taped and it was done correctly.  Removable hood.  The jacket has cuffed inner sleeves which are further cut and tapered in such a way so when you're actually using your arms, the cuffs aren't in the way and you don't have water running up both your arms.  Nice.  Imagine that a raincoat that is useful in the rain. If there is a more thoughtfully designed and tougher jacket out there, I just don't know of it or who makes it.  I'll be buying another one of these if this one ever wears out, but it looks like that may be a bit.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 2 January 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Pour la pêche ,c’est formidable !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 18 August 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I finally got to try this jacket out over the weekend and all I can say is Wow!. Very comfortable, kept me dry on the water and kept me very warm. Has lots of pockets to hold your valuables which is a big plus especially when on a boat. The material is great and very breathable. Do yourself a favor and just buy it! Dont go spending over 300$ at bass pro shops like I almost did because this jacket is so worth it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 November 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Love it
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 6 June 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: These are not the Frogg Toggs you find at you local big box sporting goods. These are premium material premium craftsmanship. I would compare them to a simms or aftco set. I wore them the other day on the lake fishing all day in a constant steady rain with temps in the low 40s with a pretty standard base layer and stayed warm and dry all day. Highly recommend.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I ordered XXL. It was huge and sleeves were to short. Cabelas  guide wear XXL fit perfectly returned and bought the Cabelas on sale same price
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 11 February 2024

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Reviewer: No Longer an Amazon Customer - had enough
Review: I purchased a medium and generally wear a large to medium, depending on the product. This was very baggy in a medium and never imagined I’d need a small.  Also, THIS DOES NOT COME WITH THE LINER.The quality of the jacket is very nice, just order a size smaller than you would for a jacket. And, remember there is not a liner that comes with it. There are internal zippers for it only.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 October 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Bought this on the thought it could be a multi season jacket, there is a liner that can be bought separately for it. After I got it I decided I didn't need to spend the extra money on the liner. (It should really be included at this price point.) As a rain jacket It doesn't work any better or worse then the cheaper frogged togg jackets work issued. It does its job and keeps you dry. I haven't found it to be sweaty like those pure nylon and plastic rain jackets. Zippers work nicely. Immoretty average in height and weight. It runs a tad big, but I think with the million dollar add on liner it would likely fit about perfectly, and it does fit well over a sweater. In the end I don't think it works better then the cheaper model work issues.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 7 May 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: This product is tru to its description. Stay bone dry
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 7 September 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I'm 5'7 and 180. I typically wear a Large shirt/Jacket. The Jacket is an almost perfect fit for me...I have room to move around, sleeves are long enough but not too long and when I reach, it doesn't ride up my arms. Pretty happy.Since I just received it in the mail, I cannot review durability nor effectiveness in rain....it's pretty lightweight, so summer use is my guess or early fall.I'll update my review next summer after I've had a chance to use it...but happy overall.I also bought the matching pants...but I bought the Large and that's a perfect fit for me as well.The hood is a bit goofy and not sure how the draw strings work, but I'll manage it. Happy purchase  overall. I do think these are WAY overpriced...but welcome to the Biden era.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 18 December 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I love this jacket the only bad thing I can say is that the hood is removable and is connected with a zipper and constantly comes unzipped if the face cover part of the hood is not secured with the velcro pieces .
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Got these for fishing in Alaska and now use them at home on the lake or river or at sporting events when it’s rainy.  Keeps me dry as can be.  Lightweight, breathable, comfortable.  Very happy with purchase.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 14 March 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I really liked the jacket, purchased the co-pilot inner coat and vest to wear in different temps. I have to do snow cleanup in Michigan so this shell kept me dry and I could wear accordingly underneath to regulate body temp as I was working in cold temps. I was comfortable with pilot co-pilot jacket combo down to -5 degrees Fahrenheit -20 Celsius, with several layers underneath. Halfway through winter though, the primary zipper for the Pilot started to separate near the bottom. The teeth will not bind and its only after about 15 min the zipper is opened up to the tab and I have to tug it down past the separation and rezip... rinse and repeat. So it lasted a season. I'll have to have a local tailor put in a new zipper for me on the Pilot or shop for  another waterproof shell with better quality zippers. The co-pilot jacket had a pocket zipper that separated on me too. I wouldn't buy the Pilot again unless they use better zipper in the future.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 March 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I bought the Pilot II jacket, overshoes, pants, gloves that go over gloves... the whole package. I'm 6'2, 310ish.. bought the 3XL jacket and 2xl pants. Perfect fit. Love this gear! I bought it to see if I could tolerate the cold... so I rode in 40-44 degree weather on my motorcycle, with just a long sleeve shirt and light sweat pants under the gear... and I was warm! The over gloves don't provide much heat, but helped a little ; but they do cover wrists. Good gear... will wear it all year round.Only drawback.. I don't like being charged to return an item! I bought the $39.99 pants.. but decided to upgrade to $90 Pilot II pant. They charged me $7.42 to basically buy more stuff from them. Not a fan of that.. I just spent around $300+ on their gear... don't get cheap on the return.Otherwise... get the gear! Good stuff.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 17 November 2018

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Very nice piece of gear - my only issues is that the zipper holding the hood keeps un-zipping when you are intermittently using the hood. Quite the pain.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 17 August 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: This gear is great! I was on the lake in 30° weather with 20 mph wind and light rain.  I stayed dry and warm. For some reason the jacket stinks to high heaven. Probably wind and water resistant chemicals producing the smell. Idk
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 6 January 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Solid jacket. Just haven’t had it long enough to give 5 stars, but very pleased with my first outing with it on salmon river in November. Kept me warm and dry even after submerging my entire arm in the water. So pretty impressed
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 29 December 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Size might run a little big but that’s okay leaves room for layering. Been out in a few rains one day rained hard most of the day and stayed dry so pretty satisfied.  Plenty of pockets has zippers to the knees for easy on off and Velcro around the ankles so you don’t have to worry about water or walking on them. I ordered a medium
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 April 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Bought along with the matching waterproof bibs for our son for Christmas.  He tried them on as soon as he opened them was was totally pleased.  We ordered his regular size which was a perfect fit.  The bibs run long, however, and were way too long for him (5’7”) but he will make them work.  He noted that the jacket is designed to attach an insulated liner if desired. These are very well made of a durable fabric.  My only issue is that they are way overpriced (in my opinion).Note: The bibs run long.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 27 December 2020

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Best Rain jacket there is, waterproof and wind proof. And with the insulated liner, very warm
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Bought this to fish with and I've worn it for a few trips.  It's fantastic in the rain.  I was out I'm the pouring rain twice and it kept me completely dry.  It's big enough to layer under it if its cold but not to hot when it's warmer out.  I wear it all the time.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I’m a conductor for BNSF railway so I’m always in the elements. I’ve struggled over the years to find rain gear that can keep me dry. Before these I bought carhartt gear which was only good for a light rain. These were able to withstand a good down poor. The only problem I had was getting my layering correct. I bought the liner that’s compatible and I over-layered and ended up sweating a little. Even with that I haven’t had this good of rain gear since I splurged on gore-tex.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 February 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Bought it for my 13 year old son.  Love it so much, gonna buy one for my youngest son.  Wish I wouldnt have spent a bunch of money on an Arc-teryx  shell for me.  I'd happy wear the Frogg -- great color, fabric, durability, and the price is fantastic.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 22 February 2022

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Very nice rain jacket.  I'm 5' 6", 190, and the large fit well with enough room to put on a couple of layers if it's colder outside.  Material is quality.  There was one issue.  The front zipper would not zip all the way up because of a minor flaw in the sew job.  I took a small amount of super glue and glued the small piece of material back, and now their aren't any issues.  Yes I could have sent it back, but it's really not a huge deal.  This is the reason I gave 4 stars.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I've worn them twice during all day rainstorms, they are comfortable and more breathable than a lot of other rainsuits I've had in the past. I read the reviews in the past that said they run small. I ordered the larger size, I ended up returning them because they were too large.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 20 May 2021

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Great product! Best rain gear on the market
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Great, heavy-weigh, well-constructed raincoat!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 23 January 2023

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Rain jackets have always provided protection from the rain at the start but the longer you stand out in the rain the material gets saturated because the waterproof layer is no longer sufficient to bead away the moisture.  This jacket is totally different, from the beginning to a few hours into the rain it still beads off the water.  I guess the saying about you get what you paid for is true, the cost on this jacket is much higher than others but it does the job.  Wish I knew about this jacket and company a long time ago.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2019

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: I was looking to find a jacket for winter fishing and that wasn't super heavy weight and this was the perfect choice. Immediately upon pulling the jacket out of the box you can feel the durability of the jacket. It's very light weight and will be easy to maneuver with it on. The detachable hood is an added feature for me as well and will completely cover the head area on the cold breezy days. To top it off, Frogg Togg provides the lifetime guarantee which I didn't even know about. Fits as expected. I'm 5' 2" and Small size was right in line with what I expected.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 8 December 2018

ProductName: FROGG TOGGS Men's Pilot II Guide Waterproof Breathable Rain Jacket
Review: Good quality. Nice looking jacket. Sizing is a bit larger than described. Ordered a large due to broad shoulders, and it fits good there, but  it does carry a bit extra sizing in the body (belly) area

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Polar Fleece Vest
Review: So my husband was hesitant to get one of these fleece vests because it’s associated with hedge fund managers….& he’s a hedge fund manager so he didn’t want to look like an idiot trying to be part of a club, so to speak. We live in Cali though & he needed something that would keep him warm on cool days without being too hot. He also needed something where he could really move in because he helps our son practice his baseball & he’s always throwing a ball-which isn’t easy with his typical jackets. He wanted something classic looking enough that he could show up to a casual meeting & still look good. So I bought it for him for Christmas. I’m still getting thank yous from my husband. He lives in this thing, absolutely loves it. He says it’s incredibly comfortable & perfect for cool weather. It checks every box. He also likes the simplicity of the look, the rich navy color. Tommy Hilfiger always puts out well made products and this was no exception. Fantastic!! Highly recommended!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 13 February 2022
