ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I  used this on a motorbike in hot and humid weather
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Australia on 29 March 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Works as advertised, very good for hot Australian summer days.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Australia on 15 November 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I ordered the same size as I normally do with clothing, but it was way too big.  I can only hope it shrinks when used.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Australia on 17 January 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Maybe the problem is my expectations, but having never bought cooling gear before I expected a bit more. What I received was a vest that says it has polyester and cotton in it in the materials tag on the vest. There's no mention of PVA anywhere, and I realize now that the "activated polymer inside" doesn't actually specify what type of plastic they talk about in this vest.So, essentially, this is a cotton T-shirt wrapped in a layer of plastic on the outside.The expectation was that it would soak in water to its core and leave the surface at most clammy. This thing is soaking wet on the outside even after you wring it dry after immersion, and the water flows down and when the top is dry-ish, the hem is dripping. So, I can only assume this isn't in any way a "high-tech" vest with PVA that soaks up a lot of water and slowly releases it to get the cooling effect.. It's a bog standard cotton-polyester vest that you can soak in water.I bought a Chill-its hat alongside this. That clearly states it does have PVA in the sweatband. And the sweatband in the hat is clearly different to the vest - it's cold and somewhat clammy feeling without feeling wet. That is what I expected from the vest, but this vest appears to have none of this more unusual material in it, making it lower tech and I suppose mildly better than just wearing a wet T-shirt. Disappointing. It will cool you down, I'm sure, but at the cost of also soaking through your clothing most likely Caveat Emptor.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 June 2016

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: It gets the job done but might be heavy for certain types of outdoor activities. Recommend soak it, ring it out , then put it in the freezer over night. Lasts a few hours be f ore chilling is needed again.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 8 October 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: My husband said it works well and keeps his cool in the Arizona heat
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Im Hochsommer den Anhänger beladen oder draußen arbeiten? GEIL!Bei Rekord-Hitze kann man den auch mal so auf T-Shirt tragen und angenehm alle 30min mal im nächsten öffentlichen Springbrunnen nass machen wärend alle anderen Leute vor Hitze stöhnen.ACHTUNG! Bei sehr anstrengender Arbeit hinterher sofort ausziehen, sonst verkühlt mach sich leicht.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 18 March 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Pas très convaincu de l’efficacité de se produit . Utilisé quelque fois pendant les fortes chaleurs avec ma moto et Bof Bof ...
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 15 September 2015

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Lo utilizo para montar en moto en verano debajo de una chaqueta ventilada. Para mí se ha convertido en indispensable, es sorprendente la reducción de temperatura que aporta. En mi caso y con el uso que le doy, tengo que volver a mojarlo cada dos horas aproximadamente
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 23 March 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Dollar for dollar , this is one of the best values I’ve come across in regards for what I got for what I spent. First off , The different colors are priced differently. I was able to immediately shave ten bucks off the price by choosing the cheapest color. It makes no difference at all since it’ll never be seen under my riding gear. I paid just a bit over $20 when the other colors were in upwards of $30. The vest arrived in the middle of brutal heatwave , with temps in the high nineties. I soaked the vest in ice water while I put on my other gear and prepped the bike. Once I put the vest on , the comfort was immediate. I rode about 100 miles in temps that never dipped below 96 and at no point in the ride did I ever feel uncomfortably hot. I was cool and comfortable the whole time. No cutting edge tech here. Just a simple accessory that took one of the biggest negatives out of my summer rides. I’ve seen evaporative cooling vests from name brands for $100 or more. Idk , maybe they have some fancy bells and whistles that make them better than this one but I can’t justify spending more when this vest does exactly what I want it to do. Dry it in the sun when you’re done to prevent bad smell/mold. My hot summer rides are now just as comfortable as my autumn rides , and for only twenty something dollars.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Bought for my missus, she loves it!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 25 May 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Di questo "gilet raffreddante" non mi è piaciuto assolutamente nulla. Appena bagnato si è intriso cosi tanto di acqua che poi per asciugarsi ci ha messo diversi giorni.Prodotto completamente inutilizzabile in quanto indossare un gilet zuppo addosso non so quanto possa giovare anche in piena estate. Un consiglio non lo acquistate che tanto poi dovete procedere al reso come ho fatto io.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 1 January 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 9 August 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I give it 5 stars although for me, I have to do some extra steps.  It works best if I don't wear a shirt underneath and if I refrigerate the vest after it's been soaked in water.  Putting it on is kind of shock but it really keeps my temperature down.  It kind of works if you just soak and/or wear a shirt underneath.Once you get it on, it doesn't drip.I haven't tried freezing it solid - just refrigerating or stashing in the freezer for 15 minutes.  If you don't refrigerate, remember that it uses evaporative cooling and works best if the humidity is not high.  I haven't tried it in anything above 60% humidity but the higher the humidity, the less effective it is.  In that case, I'd buy two and keep one in a cooler with ice and just keep swapping.  I think that is cheaper than some of the more expensive vests which have cool packs built in.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 December 2010

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Works great on hot days while riding my motorcycle in south Texas heat.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 13 July 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Me permet de faire du jogging même s'il fait 30 degrés. Après l'avoir bien  mouillé (ça goutte un peu sur le short), on peu courir confortablement pendant 20 à 25 minutes. Après, il faut trouver un point d'eau pour le mouiller à nouveau. Il faut planifier l'itinéraire pour être certain de trouver de l'eau, mais pour le prix, c'est pas si mal.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 24 November 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Reviewer: Muy buen producto, se ajusta bien a las defensas de una Ultra Limited
Review: Lo utilice en un viaje en moto de varios días y me ayudo bastante en mantenerme fresco ante el calor intenso de la carretera. Lo recomiendo bastante para este tipo de uso.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 17 August 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Je roule à moto dans le Gard (FRANCE) sous le soleil et après avoir trempé ce gilet dans l'eau froide, le laisser échapper le surplus d'eau, je l'enfile sur un T-shirt sous la veste moto . . .  Enfin, une régulation de ma température corporelle. . .  fini de transpirer à grosses gouttes de sueur dans les embarras de circulation . . .  L'effet de refroidissement dure jusqu'à 3 heures c'est selon le type de randonnée à moto et les conditions météos.  Trouver une source d'eau froide ne pose aucune difficulté puisqu'il faut aussi abreuver en carburant le 2 roues.Conclusion : super achat qui améliore l'attention et donc la sécurité du conducteur  puisque celui-ci n'est pas "anesthésié" par la chaleur du Sud.  A RECOMMANDER.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 22 February 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I bought 3 of these recently. One for my husband, myself and his friend. We live in North Carolina where the summers are unbearably humid and hot. The guys go golfing and can deal but I simply cannot!My husband and I tested it out on a bike ride for about an hour and it kept us CONSIDERABLY cooler! We did soak our vests in ice water (separately) for about 5 minutes, lightly wrung them out and patted them “dry” with a towel. As other reviewers mentioned water does drip on your pants quite a lot and soaks your shirt (we wore “dri-fits”). With the humidity , we would have had sweated and been much hotter so it’s a fair trade off , especially with the price point.My husband did test hitting a few golf balls as well and said it was not cumbersome and plans to wear it golfing, to mow our grass etc.Lastly, the lime green is definitely neon yellow but when you feel the coldness against your skin, who cares?Definitely Recommend!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: This is very effective.  I soaked it for a minute or two and wrung it out.  Went for a ride in my golf cart in 112 degrees.  Felt good.  Let the vest hang outside in the shade for a couple hours.  Put it back on and rode in the cart for another hour at 110 degrees.  It kept me cool the entire time.  Beware that these really are large!  I take a 2XL and sometimes 3XL for shirts.  I am 6' tall and come in at 260#s.  My chest is 48" (and my belly is almost the same).  The 2XL is a bit big for me but I will keep it because it does work well.  Tonight, I ordered another 1XL vest which should be just about perfect
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 July 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Got for my husband for Fathers Day. He LOVES it especially in this Texas heat. It does exactly what it says it will.  Keeps his upper body cool for hours at a time. He uses it mainly when he rides his motorcycle being that it just gets too hot to ride in the afternoons down here. He would stuff his jacket pockets with ice packets before he got this but they would melt before his commute home, now he stays nice and cool the whole ride home. He has also been know to use it when mowing the lawn also, and I’m sure will come up with many more uses. He keeps it stored mainly in a jumbo ziploc baggie filled with water so its ready to go at all times. Awesome and truly lifesaving product. Thank you!! 👏🏻👏🏻
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 21 June 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Este chaleco parece bueno pero el resultado no es el deseado, una vez mojado deja caer demasiadas gotas ¿?, lo que hace que nopuedas fiarte de no quedarte medio empapado al cabo del rato.Tendría que ser totalmente ermético y no dejar salir agua por la parte de abajo.Los portes perfectos x Amazon.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 21 March 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: J'ai tout de suite essayé ce gilet sous une combinaison de pilote par forte chaleur. Humide, il fait un certain poids mais ça ne gêne pas. Le contact n'est pas tres agreable mais il est efficace. On sent bien la sensation de fraicheur.Attention à ne pas le garder trop longtemps sur soi, sinon rhume garanti !Autre inconvénient : il se décolore vite et les vetements en contact peuvent eux se colorer ou décolorer.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 20 April 2016

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I work at amazon in a warehouse.  It's been really hot lately, so i thought I'd order this just for myself.  I don't do well it high heat and even simple things like walking, i'd break out in an extreme sweat.The vest does work well (but expect drips if you fully soak it for maximum cooling) and dripped on clothing.  It doesn't leak on the inside as that's waterproof, but the water does tend to 'pool' at the bottom of the vest and then drip if really soaked.  I can't have those drips so have to just soak the top half for safety reasons.  It does provide the cooling needed and especially on my bare arms that rub against the vest.  It does cool well.  To maximize the cooling effect, recharge it every 2.5 hours at minimum if you are using cold tap water like i do. (i want to freeze this or use ultra cold water).  If you don't, it gets a very humid feeling, at least for me in a warehouse where temps average 90degrees plus right now.the more you soak it, the better it is.  The colder the water is, the better it is.It does feel heavy.. but only at first.  You get used to it quickly and appreciate the lower temp feeling.  It has made quite a difference in my quality of life chart working in a warehouse.  I wish we used these for all employees.I am happy with my purchase and do recommend it to others with a few cautions as explained above.Tho it does feel a bit like wearing a wet t-shirt at times.4/5 stars.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 June 2011

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: This thing is a life saver. I was dying on a motorcycle ride out to Ottawa last summer with temperatures between 30-35C. I put this on and my temperature instantly dropped. Thing is you really must have it exposed to the wind. If you wear it under a jacket, the upper chest part will dry out leaving the bottom permanently moist. The only reason it doesnt get 5 stars is it leaks and the water eventually finds its way to the bottom of the vest where its not cooling much anymore.I bought a medium and it's slightly baggy on me: you want it as tight as comfortable for it to work best. I'm 5'9" around 170lbs.I'm glad this is a part of my permanent motorcycle gear selection.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 17 December 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Arrivato nei tempi previsti. Lo uso per turismo sotto un giubbotto da moto con abondanti parti a rete e nel caldo torrido e in viaggio si sente il beneficio.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 18 September 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I do think they lose their cooling effectiveness as the summer goes on. I notice the vest is considerably lighter, so the little cooling granules are used up or possibly squeezed out by then. I get it as wet as possible and just try to barely squeeze out the excess water so that I don't leave a water trail from the sink to my work site (which is actually my car---I also don't really want my seat soaking wet...just me!). I am a mail carrier so my air conditioner doesn't help much in the summer when we work with the window open. These vests are far superior to the ice vests I was using as I can just carry a bottle of water and refresh it quickly. I carry a 6packsize cooler full of water and just dunk it in there every few hours and keep on moving!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 June 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: The 3x is actually quite big. I should have got the 2x for a snug fit. As it is a vest. It gets heavy but worth it.  I put mine in chilled water and then put in deep freezer.It should be noted that this does have a slime feel to it. In 30 degrees of hotness in my workplace the vest deep frozen holds its coolness for about an hour. Then I freeze again for 15 minutes.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 27 May 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Positiv : Hält was sie verspricht.Negativ: Wird durch das Wasser sehr schwer.Verliert das Wasser nach und nach wodurch man vom Rücken an Abwärts komplett nass wird.Also eher nichts wenn man sich damit viel bewegen muss.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 21 July 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: je l'ai acheté pour mon père qui travaille dans une usine très chaude ! il aime, ça rafraichit ! je n'y croyais pas, certes c'est pas la clim, mais quand on bosse dehors ou en usine c'est ESSENTIEL IMMPOSSIBLE DE NE PAS L'AVOIR !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 23 June 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: When wet ,  This item is very heavy. It did produce noticeable cooling and I was glad to have it. The size I chose was too large but I ordered the  largest one .
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Hallo, eine Kühlweste sollte kühlen und das tut Sie. Die Weste ist sehr angenehm zu tragen. Die Passform entspricht den normalen Größen.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 2 June 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: May wan to size down.  This is a great  cooling vest. I had to wear a shirt over it to keep the vest plastered to my body because it was too big when doused in cold water.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 19 August 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: this works!  A bit of trial and error for me (the first few times I did not blot enuf = my clothes got wet, but since I was in my backyard in 100 degree heat, I didnt' care.  For out in public at friend's houses for example, I had to learn how to better blot.  It definitely doesn't get me cold, but it does help keep me cool for about 3 hours in 90+ degree weather.  The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars (and perhaps I'm just not realistic), I would be ecstatic if this actually got colder than it does.  O well, I'm happy w/ this as I'm not aware of anything else (w/in a reasonable price point) that would do a better job.  O and I recommended this to my Dad who preaches as a deacon in a church that while big, doesn't get very cool up in the alter area and he is thrilled too - he wears it over his shirt, but under his vestments (he got the beige color) and says it really helps him.  BTW - the customer service for Ergodyne (a local company for me) is wonderful - I had a question about sizing and the gal I called in customer service was gracious and extremely helpful!  Her advice helped me to choose the right size the 1st time around :)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2012

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Being *EXTREMELY* sensitive to heat, and working outside these days to rebuild the backyard deck, I had rivers of sweat pouring down my eyes, blinding me in minutes. Today, in another 35C heat day, with this vest, I was as cool as a 'The Dude' Leboswki.On the down side, your clothes will be wet.On the plus side, you will survive the heat !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 4 July 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Excellent Product. I'm pretty sure this is the same manufacturer that makes cooling vests for Sedici (motorcycle brand) ORDER DOWN A SIZE! I'm 5'9 L and an XL with "slim fit" shirts. I trusted the reviews and ordered down a size.. the medium fit PERFECTLY.It's incredible what a difference this jacket made for me. For my motorcycle people: YOU NEED THIS! It fit perfectly in my suit and did not restrict movement or make me feel uncomfortable. Jacket lasts about 40 minutes before you need to toss it back into your ice chest (which is PERFECT!) Make sure it's soaked in water or else your body won't be able to transfer heat to the jacket as efficiently.I was hydrating as frequently as I would with a normal trackday and I could barely break a sweat in 90 degree weather. I didn't wear the jacket for one of the sessions...Suddenly I was extremely uncomfortable I had sweat running down my eyes.stop doubting and buy!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 6 June 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Yes, there are probably better options out on the market but, for the price, this vest works as described. I think they are a little larger than posted…l see where folks get them wet and put them in the fridge, before using them. We don’t have that luxury when your riding 450 miles in 100 degree dry heat for 7-8 hours a day. In this type of weather, l was stopping every 3 hours and refuel the bike and rewatering the vest… The lime yellow is very bright and noticeable, good for visibility by others. The vest keeps me alert and comfortable too… well made and affordable..
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: High quality materials.  Absorbs a lot of water without being heavy or awkward.  Holds onto moisture but dries completely. Instantly cools the body like jumping into water... So I would day it will buy an hour in the Okanagan Sun where it is dry but very very hot.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 3 May 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I use this for woodworking in my garage during the summer in Tucson. This plus a bucket of ice water to recharge and a fan works pretty good to stay cool. Three stars because it seems to leak some of the gel every time I soak it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 November 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I was not impressed. Wetting the vest down with cold water didn't keep me any cooler. I even went to the extreme and placed it in my freezer. Once it was frozen, the coolnest only lasted for about 20 minutes. The vest also adds a few pounds to your burden of having to wear extra weight in the heat. I will be returning it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 July 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I bought this for my husband who works outside in the Texas heat. He tried it a couple of times and doesn't like it. If it's excessively hot, 100+, this really won't help. It might be effective in less hot and humid climates. Not a bad product just didn't work for him.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 24 September 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Utilisé pour rouler en moto à des températures >40°C.Double avantage, ça la peau humidifié dans des zones ultra sec. Et ça rafraîchit vraiment l'air porté sous ma veste de moto d'été.Attention, comme marqué dans d'autres avis, aux premières utilisation ça peut tâcher (attention au blanc).Et ça taille vraiment très grand. Ce Large équivaut un XXL en Europe.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 6 August 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I thought the vest may have a special absorbent liner between the outer and inner shell, but appears to be only 2 layers of fabric. Hence it does weep considerably after being soaked and wrung and the water travels to the lower parts. In retrospect any soaked fabric vest would have the same effect. It does fit well and comfortable and does cool by keeping your T-shirt soaked - which isn't a bad thing when you're sweating anyways.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 28 October 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Nach dem eintauchen in Wasser wirkt die Weste deutlich nass und gibt die Feuchtigkeit nach innen und aussen ab. Wechselklamotten mitnehmen..
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 19 May 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Te deja todo mojado y terminas resfriado
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 7 June 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Husband says it really helped him on his 95 degree plus summer rides!  It was a little heavier than he thought it would be but very valuable for traveling by motorcycle across country.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 September 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: doesnt work and utter rubbish might as well wear a green t shirt. dont waste you money
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 20 March 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Stayed damp for a few hours. Works well.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 16 July 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Kein gutes Model entsprach nicht meinen Erwartungen als Kühlweste, kann ich empfehlen , kommt vielleicht auch darauf an wofür es verwendet wird
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 15 March 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Funciona
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 9 December 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Köp en storlek mindre än du brukar ha på tröjor
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Sweden on 26 February 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Wer eine Weste mag die leicht und trotzdem warm hält (trage sie gerade bei circa +6 bis 10 Grad) als oberste  3. Kleidungsschicht) wird echt zufrieden sein.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 23 October 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Nice body warmer. Very light, packs down small. Looks good,very flattering for my dad bod.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 September 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ottimo gilet, leggero e caldo, per passeggiate al fresco è adatto!Ho preso una misura in meno e veste perfettamente!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 2 January 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Il prodotto è buono e l'ho trovato in offerta. Sapevo che vestiva largo perché avevo già una giacca tecnica di questa marca, però in realtà questi capi devono essere aderenti e anche con una taglia in meno, l'ho fatto modificare leggermente. Cmq tiene caldo pur essendo leggero e i fianchi elastici permette di sagomarlo perfettamente.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 15 April 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Molto bello. Consiglio di prendere una taglia più piccola di quella che prendete di solito: io prendo sempre XL, ma con la Columbia mi sta meglio L.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 9 March 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Cómodo y ajustable, con bolsillos útiles
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 3 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Rien a dire, juste parfaite
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 24 May 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Buon gilet per le mezze stagioni oppure da indossare nei trekking invernali durante le salite.L'inserto elasticizzato sui fianchi garantisce una buona libertà di movimento e limita la sudorazione se usato per attività sportiva. Molto utili i 2 elastici per regolare la circonferenza della vita cosi da poter decidere se indossarlo piu aderente o piu largo.Vestibilità slim, quindi prendere la propria taglia se si vuole indossarlo piu aderente mentre valutare una taglia in piu se si vole portarlo piu largo.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 13 January 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: J’ai acheté cette doudoune sans manche pour m’accompagner sur les terrains de golfs et franchement je ne suis pas déçu. La couleur est très sobre et la marque discrète. Le confort est top et le col épais fait en sorte qu’il ne s’affaisse pas ce qui donne un look très élégant. Seul bémol pour ma part c’est qu’il n’y a pas de poche en zip à l’intérieur de la veste. Mais pour le reste je suis très content. Pour le prix je recommande !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 27 October 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Quasi ottimo ma veste grande ed è molto leggero
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 29 June 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Super Qualität und dabei leicht und nicht auftragend. Passt auch unter eine Jacke! Columbia fällt groß aus. Lieber eine Nummer kleiner bestellen.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 23 September 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: L'articolo è fatto con materiali soddisfacenti e fa il suo (tiene caldi e protegge dal vento).Veste 1 Taglia Meno del Normale (ed in questo senso è comodo anche per tenerlo sotto altra giacca).La nota scomoda è che, come si legge in altre recensioni, ha la zip all'americana (noi si direbbe "da donna"), ovvero il cursore è nella metà opposta rispetto a quella dove lo vorremmo (non è difetto insormontabile ma costituisce mediamente una seccatura).
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 30 March 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Me ha gustado mucho porque no pesa nada y es muy cómoda.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 11 November 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Leggero,comodo e ottimo modello
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 21 March 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Fits well as described, really warm and of very good quality.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 July 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Perfecto, calentito y ligero
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 18 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Das Material selbst ist super, fühlt sich gut, leicht und warm an, nur leider ist mir die Weste in L um einiges zu groß. Da ich sie zum laufen benötige sollte sie etwas enger sitzen.Ich bin 186cm/80kgWenn jemand allerdings darunter noch einen dicken Pullover tragen möchte wird er zufrieden mit der Größe sein.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 13 November 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Un buon amico leggero che accompagna la nostra primavera o da sotticombinaziine nel nostro inverno. Attenti alle taglue, un po' abbondanti. Comunque consigliato
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 17 March 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Gilet molto leggero ma perfetto per le giornate in cui è leggermento freschetto da indossare sopra una maglietta leggera a maniche corte o lunghe. Bello, comodo, leggero da indossare ed elengante
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 2 March 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: I bought this from Amazon as it was the cheapest online. Everywhere else had it marked upto £75. If I did pay that much I would have returned it.I've had Columbia clothing previously and have never been let down. Their quality has always been excellent.The gilet is well made but slightly less thicker than I thought it was going to be.I've worn it a few times and each time I've been kept warm, so maybe the thickness is not needed.The zips are good quality and feel like they will last.For £55 it's great value and not worth anymore.I'm a 58" chest and it fits nice and will go over a jacket if needed or under with no hassle.Its not bulky and does not feel like I'm wrapped in a sleeping bag.Good value.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 October 2020

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Alto 1,80 per 80 kg taglia L perfetta calza benissimo e di ottima qualità
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 29 March 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Offert à mon mari pour Noël ! Très jolie doudoune sans manche, il est ravi.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 25 December 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Sieht super aus, sehr leicht, tolle Qualität und passt hervorragend. Die größe XXL mit EU 60 ausgeschildert und das kommt auch hin. Trage T.- Shirt auch in XXL und die Passen auch.  Für den Übergang sehr gut geeignet und sogar Wasser abweisend.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 28 July 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Giubilo ottimo, comodo e rimane ben aderente al corpo (per chi piace vestire cosi).Io sono alto 175, peso 82kg e ho ordinato una tg M , vestibilità perfetta.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 23 October 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Gilet molto bello, leggero. Veste comodo.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 13 May 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Molto leggero ma molto carino e pratico
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 21 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Muy bonito y muy cómodo, gran compra!!!,
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 15 October 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: keeps u warm
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2024

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Taglio assolutamente slim di buona qualità e soprattutto leggero il giusto x le mezze stagioni
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 30 January 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: El ajuste, el tallaje y el diseño me encantan. Muy cálida para el espesor que tiene, el forro interior de los bolsillos calienta las manos y tiene un tacto muy suave. El único pero es que por la parte trasera se sale el relleno, poco a poco pero de forma continua. Llevo más de dos meses recortandolo. Por la calidad general de la marca y su precio no entiendo por qué pasa esto.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 9 February 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ho acquistato una taglia L sono alto 1.76 e peso 80 kg e mi stava grande faccio il reso-cambio con una taglia M arrivato il giorno seguente velocissimi. Ottima vestibilita vi consiglio una taglia in meno,  leggero da usare in primavera/autunno sopra una maglietta o una camicia. Stretto sui fianchi e si puo'stringere intorno alla vita. Motlo bello indossato soddisfatto.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 18 July 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: solides et confortable réchauffement en temps froid pour le printemps
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 30 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Smart summer gillet, adds that extra warmth as it gets cooler! Competitively priced.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 July 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Da ich schon eine andere Weste von Columbia besitze, welche allerdings rundum gepolstert ist und innen mit einer extra Alu-Thermoschicht ausgestattet ist, wollte ich noch eine nicht ganz so warme Weste für die etwas wärmeren der Herbst- und Frühlingstage, bei denen man zwar gerne noch Weste tragen aber gleichzeitig nicht dabei schwitzen möchte. Da nur vorne und hinten wärmendes Polster verwendet wird, ist unter den Armen für mein Empfinden angenehm dünnerer Stoff, was sich ja durch die natürliche Position der Arme gut ausgleicht. Wie erwähnt: Für richtig kalte Tage in Kombi mit Jacke oder gar als regelrechter Jackenersatz ist sie etwas dünn, aber für nicht ganz so frische Tage oder in Kombi mit Pullover morgens zum Beispiel aber prima geeignet. Bei 10 bis 15 Grad ist sie derzeit meine erste Wahl.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 9 November 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Giubbino smanicato leggero,rifinito bene, ottima vestibilità! Usabile tutto l'anno, nelle stagioni intermedie come gilet su una camicia, in inverno sotto una giubbino se necessita più calore! Prodotto Columbia, una garanzia!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 3 September 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: I wouldn’t recommend this gilet, it’s very thin and felt cheap so I returned it. Good price though, so it might suit someone who wants a cheap gilet.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 July 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ligero (muy ligero), confortable y de excelente abrigo. Si lo quieres ajustado con una camiseta pide una talla menos de la habitual. Columbia es calidad sin duda.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 4 April 2019

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: une marque au top avec des prix raisonnable pour une doudoune de bonne qualité qui a des clips de serrage de chaque côté a l intérieur pour éviter le froid et des poches comparer à certaines qui n’ont rien de tout ça manque une capuche pour la 5 étoiles
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 25 October 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Per il costo di 51 euro vale l'acquisto. La vestibilità è leggermente aderente ed è perfetto per l'autunno e la primavera.Lascio 4 stelle per alcune cuciture non proprio impeccabili, ma comunque non assolutamente difettose.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 8 April 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Die Jacke ist angenehm leicht, sieht gut aus und hat eine gute Passform.Sehr enttäuscht bin ich jedoch von beiden Reissverschlüssen.1. Der Hauptreisverschluss ist bei der Herrenweste für Damen ausgelegt, sehr ungewohnt da spiegelverkehrt zum verschliessen.2. Die beiden Reissverschlüssen für die Taschen links und rechts lassen sich sehr schwer öffnen und schließen, da sie sich stets im Textilgewebe verfangen und man den Verschluss erst wieder herauslösen muss. Das habe ich bei einer Markenweste nicht erwartet. Deswegen insgesamt nur 3 Sterne.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 31 October 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Perfetto solo un po grande prendere una taglia in meno...
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 16 October 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ottimo prodotto e rapporto qualità prezzo.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 3 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Talla grande,yo cogi una talla menos y perfecto. Muy buena calidad.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 13 November 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Top ! assez fin mais chaud, confortable et élégant
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 7 April 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Item was top notch but the fit was very (too) big. I would have definitely ordered a size down, maybe two, had I known this.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2024

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Di ottima qualità
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 1 May 2021

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Bellissimo smanicato, leggerissimo da portare ma che tiene il giusto caldo nella mezza stagione. Quando in offerta sicuramente consigliato!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 12 November 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ich wollte früher keine Westen, aber das ist eine praktische Kombi für die Tage an denen es noch nicht zu kalt ist, wirkt bisher gut verarbeitet und sieht gut aus.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 1 December 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Vest, Powder Pass
Review: Ho preso una taglia in meno di quella che porto perché mi piace aderente. Sono alto 182 e peso 87 e con una camicia sta una meraviglia. Prezzo adeguato se scontato. Consiglio per il materiale, la vestibilità e il brand
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 1 November 2022

ProductName: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0
Review: Perfect fit and size
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Australia on 27 February 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0
Review: Amazon had a note on the product page: "Large will fit you best based on data from customers who buy the same sizes as you" - I wanted to believe this algorithm was correct & glad I read other reviews - I'm 5'7" 110-115 lbs w a waist size of 29/30" - I looked at the sizing table and sure enough Small is my size which I was suspicious of as I usually get Medium. I got lucky Medium went out of stock & gambled on the Small. while waiting, I realized my trusty old fleece I am replacing is a Columbia & a Small!  that cinched the deal & put me at peace. When it arrived today, it fits just as well - it doesnt seem as thick as my old one so I'm gonna just have to try it on my upcoming trip to cooler regions & see how it performs. I hope it lasts as long as my old one - it's easily been a daily driver for over 5 years (I wouldn't doubt if it is 10 years old to be honest!) - the cuffs are completely stretched out & just found out it will be easy to replace the broken YYK zip pull so it will be regulated to casual use as it a *very* effective middle layer with a turtleneck (or thermal) underneath & windbreaker on top!again, this review is mostly to inform about sizing to help others nail it the first time - I just put my experience with a prior Columbia product I've been more than happy with that led to this purchase.  I'll probably update this review after I've used the new one extensively in a very similar manner (esp camping 🏕️)UPDATE (5/2/23): the new one seems surprisingly warmer - I don’t know if it’s because of the sheer age of the old one - but thinner/warmer/lighter is always welcome. I also noticed they cut costs by only putting one cinch buckle around the waist (it used to be on both sides) - the quality of the buckle is smaller and clearly cheaper & the elastic that goes around is thinner.  I’m glad the waist elastic is still in the product but it sure doesn’t look like it’s going to last 10-15 years - I guess we’ll see.  you’ll also have to wash and/or air out the fleece - while it’s not overbearing - I could tell my skin felt a bit sensitive to whatever leftover chemicals that were left from the process and I only put it on for maybe 15 min while it was new?  and I can confirm that they’ve switched from the embroidered logo for a stitched tag - before it was very subtle and blended and now it’s blatant branding (which I do have mixed feelings about).  The zips are still YYK fortunately. This one is made in Bangladesh (where my old one was made in Vietnam).  okay these are just first impressions - now to put it to some rigorous field testing for a few years!UPDATE (6/8/23): just got back from a 18 day trip and this has been field tested :) it did well in 50 degree weather in the Santa Cruz mountains layered w a turtleneck (UNIQLO heat tech) and a windbreaker (I could notice a big difference without the windbreaker, in fact, I was cold in 50 degree weather. In 60 degree weather layered with a quick dry T & long sleeve shell, I was plenty warm without the windbreaker). Something that is annoying is the way they've attached the rope pulls on the zippers - they've come off 2 or 3x already - you're likely to lose them if you are not careful. Once it came off casually & yesterday I went to wash it & one was just lying inside the machine - it's only attached via a simple loop to the zip pull & clearly a "cosmetic" thing. I'm tempted to dock a star but from a pure functionally standpoint, the fleece did its most basic job (keep me warm!) and looks so much better than my drab grey one I had prior!  I'm still satisfied :)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 1 May 2023

ProductName: Columbia Men's Steens Mountain Full Zip 2.0
Review: me he comprado los dos forros polares, el glacier de North Face y este de Columbia, básicamente uno compite directamente con el otro. Los dos me encantan, si bien la talla M es mucho mas ajustada para el de North face que el de Columbia que es mas holgado, aunque no es que te quede grande, simplemente hay tipos de forros polares, unos que te permiten poner mas ropa en el interior, y otros que se ajustan mas para cuando no necesitas mas ropa pero estar cómodo y calentito. Por ejemplo si hace mucho frio durante años me he puesto dos forros polares y no necesitaba chaqueta (lo que me parecía super comodo), pero siempre me ponía dos holgados, ahora podré ponerme el glacier debajo y este encima, genial. Estoy por comprar otro, los dos son de alta calidad y calientan mucho, cremalleras como me gustan en los bolsillos, y un precio absurdamente bajo en comparación al precio cuando salieron, estos forros son mucho mejores que los forros de otras marcas al mismo precio.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 7 September 2023

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Ultra Loft Lightweight Packable Puffer Jacket (Standard and Big & Tall)
Review: Just received this jacket and first impression is very good. Medium - Fits well if a tad snug. The feel of the jacket is smooth and soft. The color, red, is not a bright red, so fits my color tastes perfectly. Zippers are very smooth up and down. I like that it zips all the way up into a high collar, keeping the neck area warm in cold/cool air. Inside pockets on both sides, nice. Stepped outside for a minute on this cool not cold day and it feels quite warm. Will see over time how warm it is in colder weather. I do have a heavier Hilfiger jacket for very cold weather so this was bought for cool to cooler weather. Obviously have not worn it in the rain, but then I do not spend a lot of time in the rain, so it is not of much concern to me. I'm sure it will do fine for running to and from the car. Noticed one commenter complained it is cheap and thin. I'd ask what do you not understand about the description that say's it is a lightweight jacket. Still it does not strike me as cheap (very reasonably priced) and of good quality. If my experience changes I'll be back to update, but for now I am very satisfied with this jacket and am thinking of getting another with the ICE color and maybe a step up in size. Though I do like a slim look as compared to big and bulky, so maybe not. ;-)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2023

Review: Kurz zur Info: Ich bin 1,88m (und wiege 90kg). Daher habe ich die Brandit in Größe XL bestellt.  Passt hervorragend, insbesondere auch bzgl. der Armlänge mit der ich oft Probleme habe (zu kurz). Mit der Brandit nicht.Da ich die Jacke für Foto-Wanderungen und Kamera-Outdoor nutzen wollte, sollte es eine Känguru-Jacke für Objektive etc. sein. Und tatsächlich, in diese Jacke passt mein 300er Zoom-Objektiv mit 20 cm Länge perfekt hinein. Ich bekomme sogar das dicke Tamron 150-500 mm noch rein, die Tasche ist groß genug. Der abgedeckte Reissverschluss an allen Taschen schützt zudem sehr gut gegen "unschönes" Wetterverhältnisse. Fazit: Sehr gutes Produkt zu einem fast sagenhaft guten Preis.

ProductName: Brandit Summer Windbreaker,Rain Jacket,Jacket,Training Jacket, Size S TO 5XL
Review: Ich war angenehm überrascht, die Jacke ist sehr leicht und trotzdem gut wasserdicht. Auch durch die Unterfütterung entsteht ein kleines Luftpolster, was für eine angenehme Trageeigenschafft sorgt, auch dann noch wenn man im starken Regen unterwegs ist. Die Klettverschlüsse mit dem Reißverschluss schützen vor Wind und Wasser, an den Armen sind Gummibündchen und auch die Kapuze kann man durch Zugbändchen am Gesicht gut anlegen. Über Farben lässt sich auch streiten, ich bevorzuge etwa Neutrales, aber auch für Jugendliche ist eine sehr gute Auswahl vorhanden. Ich finde die Jacke als sehr empfehlenswert.

ProductName: Brandit Summer Windbreaker,Rain Jacket,Jacket,Training Jacket, Size S TO 5XL
Review: Ich habe mir vor einiger Zeit eine Herren Regenjacke zugelegt, und ich kann ehrlich sagen, dass es eine der besten Investitionen war, die ich für meine Outdoor-Aktivitäten getätigt habe. Diese Regenjacke hat sich in jeder Hinsicht als herausragend erwiesen, und ich möchte meine Erfahrungen gerne teilen.Die Wasserdichtigkeit dieser Jacke ist beeindruckend. Egal, ob es nur leicht regnet oder in Strömen gießt, diese Jacke hält mich trocken. Das Material ist von hoher Qualität und hält den Regen effektiv ab, ohne dabei sperrig oder unbequem zu sein. Ich kann meine Aktivitäten im Freien ohne Angst vor Nässe genießen.Was mich besonders begeistert, ist die Atmungsaktivität dieser Regenjacke. Selbst bei intensiven Wanderungen oder Aktivitäten, bei denen ich ins Schwitzen gerate, fühle ich mich nicht unangenehm feucht oder überhitzt. Die Belüftungssysteme funktionieren hervorragend, um ein angenehmes Körperklima zu gewährleisten.Die Langlebigkeit dieser Herren Regenjacke hat mich ebenfalls überzeugt. Trotz mehrfacher Benutzung und verschiedener Wetterbedingungen zeigt sie keinerlei Abnutzungserscheinungen. Die Qualität der Verarbeitung ist wirklich bemerkenswert.In Bezug auf das Design bin ich äußerst zufrieden. Diese Jacke ist in verschiedenen Farben und Stilen erhältlich, so dass sie zu unterschiedlichen Anlässen und Outfits passt. Sie ist funktional und gleichzeitig modisch, was mir sehr gefällt.Zusammengefasst kann ich diese Herren Regenjacke nur wärmstens empfehlen. Sie bietet erstklassigen Schutz vor Regen und Wind, ist bequem zu tragen und sieht dabei auch noch großartig aus. Diese Jacke hat sich wirklich als unverzichtbares Kleidungsstück für Outdoor-Enthusiasten erwiesen, und ich kann sie jedem empfehlen, der nach einer hochwertigen und stilvollen Regenjacke sucht.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 9 October 2023

Review: Zuerst die guten Nachrichten: Lieferung war in Ordnung und die Größe der Jacke passte sehr gut. Was bei meinem Bauch nicht so einfach ist. Die Jacke wird als Windbreaker und Regenjacke beworben. Windbreaker passt. Aber Regenjacke ist das keine. Gleich beim ersten Regen war ich nach etwa 5 min. bis auf mein T-Shirt durchnässt. Unter Regenjacke verstehe ich etwas anderes. Ich werde sie trotzdem behalten. In meiner Größe ist es nicht so einfach, passende Kleidung zu finden. Daher freue ich mich jetzt über eine Übergangsjacke mit einem guten Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. 2 Punkte Abzug, weil es einfach keine Regenjacke ist.

ProductName: Brandit Summer Windbreaker,Rain Jacket,Jacket,Training Jacket, Size S TO 5XL
Review: Lets just put it out there this is more for casual wear than anything else. Sure it comes in camouflage but so do a lot of none tacticool cloths. Quality is fine but while billed as a "Summer" wind jacket I would only where this during the summer in the UK, Scandinavia, or Upper Siberia. If you want a true summer weight pullover go with the Helikon Wind Shirt. This has no functionality above your average kangaroo pocket pullover but it does have one mysterious zip air vent on one side of the pullover but not the other, so much to the concept of pass through ventilation. So all in all wahawahwahhhhh. Oh and this is the first pullover I've had that doesn't have a pass through onesi hand pocket. :(

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Maybe the problem is my expectations, but having never bought cooling gear before I expected a bit more. What I received was a vest that says it has polyester and cotton in it in the materials tag on the vest. There's no mention of PVA anywhere, and I realize now that the "activated polymer inside" doesn't actually specify what type of plastic they talk about in this vest.So, essentially, this is a cotton T-shirt wrapped in a layer of plastic on the outside.The expectation was that it would soak in water to its core and leave the surface at most clammy. This thing is soaking wet on the outside even after you wring it dry after immersion, and the water flows down and when the top is dry-ish, the hem is dripping. So, I can only assume this isn't in any way a "high-tech" vest with PVA that soaks up a lot of water and slowly releases it to get the cooling effect.. It's a bog standard cotton-polyester vest that you can soak in water.I bought a Chill-its hat alongside this. That clearly states it does have PVA in the sweatband. And the sweatband in the hat is clearly different to the vest - it's cold and somewhat clammy feeling without feeling wet. That is what I expected from the vest, but this vest appears to have none of this more unusual material in it, making it lower tech and I suppose mildly better than just wearing a wet T-shirt. Disappointing. It will cool you down, I'm sure, but at the cost of also soaking through your clothing most likely Caveat Emptor.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 June 2016

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: It gets the job done but might be heavy for certain types of outdoor activities. Recommend soak it, ring it out , then put it in the freezer over night. Lasts a few hours be f ore chilling is needed again.

GEIL!Bei Rekord-Hitze kann man den auch mal so auf T-Shirt tragen und angenehm alle 30min mal im nächsten öffentlichen Springbrunnen nass machen wärend alle anderen Leute vor Hitze stöhnen.ACHTUNG! Bei sehr anstrengender Arbeit hinterher sofort ausziehen, sonst verkühlt mach sich leicht.

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Pas très convaincu de l’efficacité de se produit . Utilisé quelque fois pendant les fortes chaleurs avec ma moto et Bof Bof ...
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 15 September 2015

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Lo utilizo para montar en moto en verano debajo de una chaqueta ventilada. Para mí se ha convertido en indispensable, es sorprendente la reducción de temperatura que aporta. En mi caso y con el uso que le doy, tengo que volver a mojarlo cada dos horas aproximadamente
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 23 March 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Dollar for dollar , this is one of the best values I’ve come across in regards for what I got for what I spent. First off , The different colors are priced differently. I was able to immediately shave ten bucks off the price by choosing the cheapest color. It makes no difference at all since it’ll never be seen under my riding gear. I paid just a bit over $20 when the other colors were in upwards of $30. The vest arrived in the middle of brutal heatwave , with temps in the high nineties. I soaked the vest in ice water while I put on my other gear and prepped the bike. Once I put the vest on , the comfort was immediate. I rode about 100 miles in temps that never dipped below 96 and at no point in the ride did I ever feel uncomfortably hot. I was cool and comfortable the whole time. No cutting edge tech here. Just a simple accessory that took one of the biggest negatives out of my summer rides. I’ve seen evaporative cooling vests from name brands for $100 or more. Idk , maybe they have some fancy bells and whistles that make them better than this one but I can’t justify spending more when this vest does exactly what I want it to do. Dry it in the sun when you’re done to prevent bad smell/mold. My hot summer rides are now just as comfortable as my autumn rides , and for only twenty something dollars.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Bought for my missus, she loves it!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 25 May 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Di questo "gilet raffreddante" non mi è piaciuto assolutamente nulla. Appena bagnato si è intriso cosi tanto di acqua che poi per asciugarsi ci ha messo diversi giorni.Prodotto completamente inutilizzabile in quanto indossare un gilet zuppo addosso non so quanto possa giovare anche in piena estate. Un consiglio non lo acquistate che tanto poi dovete procedere al reso come ho fatto io.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 1 January 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 9 August 2020

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I give it 5 stars although for me, I have to do some extra steps.  It works best if I don't wear a shirt underneath and if I refrigerate the vest after it's been soaked in water.  Putting it on is kind of shock but it really keeps my temperature down.  It kind of works if you just soak and/or wear a shirt underneath.Once you get it on, it doesn't drip.I haven't tried freezing it solid - just refrigerating or stashing in the freezer for 15 minutes.  If you don't refrigerate, remember that it uses evaporative cooling and works best if the humidity is not high.  I haven't tried it in anything above 60% humidity but the higher the humidity, the less effective it is.  In that case, I'd buy two and keep one in a cooler with ice and just keep swapping.  I think that is cheaper than some of the more expensive vests which have cool packs built in.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 December 2010

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Works great on hot days while riding my motorcycle in south Texas heat.

Après, il faut trouver un point d'eau pour le mouiller à nouveau. Il faut planifier l'itinéraire pour être certain de trouver de l'eau, mais pour le prix, c'est pas si mal.

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Reviewer: Muy buen producto, se ajusta bien a las defensas de una Ultra Limited
Review: Lo utilice en un viaje en moto de varios días y me ayudo bastante en mantenerme fresco ante el calor intenso de la carretera. Lo recomiendo bastante para este tipo de uso.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Mexico on 17 August 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Je roule à moto dans le Gard (FRANCE) sous le soleil et après avoir trempé ce gilet dans l'eau froide, le laisser échapper le surplus d'eau, je l'enfile sur un T-shirt sous la veste moto . . .  Enfin, une régulation de ma température corporelle. . .  fini de transpirer à grosses gouttes de sueur dans les embarras de circulation . . .  L'effet de refroidissement dure jusqu'à 3 heures c'est selon le type de randonnée à moto et les conditions météos.  Trouver une source d'eau froide ne pose aucune difficulté puisqu'il faut aussi abreuver en carburant le 2 roues.Conclusion : super achat qui améliore l'attention et donc la sécurité du conducteur  puisque celui-ci n'est pas "anesthésié" par la chaleur du Sud.  A RECOMMANDER.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 22 February 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I bought 3 of these recently. One for my husband, myself and his friend. We live in North Carolina where the summers are unbearably humid and hot. The guys go golfing and can deal but I simply cannot!My husband and I tested it out on a bike ride for about an hour and it kept us CONSIDERABLY cooler! We did soak our vests in ice water (separately) for about 5 minutes, lightly wrung them out and patted them “dry” with a towel. As other reviewers mentioned water does drip on your pants quite a lot and soaks your shirt (we wore “dri-fits”). With the humidity , we would have had sweated and been much hotter so it’s a fair trade off , especially with the price point.My husband did test hitting a few golf balls as well and said it was not cumbersome and plans to wear it golfing, to mow our grass etc.Lastly, the lime green is definitely neon yellow but when you feel the coldness against your skin, who cares?Definitely Recommend!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: This is very effective.  I soaked it for a minute or two and wrung it out.  Went for a ride in my golf cart in 112 degrees.  Felt good.  Let the vest hang outside in the shade for a couple hours.  Put it back on and rode in the cart for another hour at 110 degrees.  It kept me cool the entire time.  Beware that these really are large!  I take a 2XL and sometimes 3XL for shirts.  I am 6' tall and come in at 260#s.  My chest is 48" (and my belly is almost the same).  The 2XL is a bit big for me but I will keep it because it does work well.  Tonight, I ordered another 1XL vest which should be just about perfect
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 July 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Got for my husband for Fathers Day. He LOVES it especially in this Texas heat. It does exactly what it says it will.  Keeps his upper body cool for hours at a time. He uses it mainly when he rides his motorcycle being that it just gets too hot to ride in the afternoons down here. He would stuff his jacket pockets with ice packets before he got this but they would melt before his commute home, now he stays nice and cool the whole ride home. He has also been know to use it when mowing the lawn also, and I’m sure will come up with many more uses. He keeps it stored mainly in a jumbo ziploc baggie filled with water so its ready to go at all times. Awesome and truly lifesaving product. Thank you!! 👏🏻👏🏻
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 21 June 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Este chaleco parece bueno pero el resultado no es el deseado, una vez mojado deja caer demasiadas gotas ¿?, lo que hace que nopuedas fiarte de no quedarte medio empapado al cabo del rato.Tendría que ser totalmente ermético y no dejar salir agua por la parte de abajo.Los portes perfectos x Amazon.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Spain on 21 March 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: J'ai tout de suite essayé ce gilet sous une combinaison de pilote par forte chaleur. Humide, il fait un certain poids mais ça ne gêne pas. Le contact n'est pas tres agreable mais il est efficace. On sent bien la sensation de fraicheur.Attention à ne pas le garder trop longtemps sur soi, sinon rhume garanti !Autre inconvénient : il se décolore vite et les vetements en contact peuvent eux se colorer ou décolorer.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 20 April 2016

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I work at amazon in a warehouse.  It's been really hot lately, so i thought I'd order this just for myself.  I don't do well it high heat and even simple things like walking, i'd break out in an extreme sweat.The vest does work well (but expect drips if you fully soak it for maximum cooling) and dripped on clothing.  It doesn't leak on the inside as that's waterproof, but the water does tend to 'pool' at the bottom of the vest and then drip if really soaked.  I can't have those drips so have to just soak the top half for safety reasons.  It does provide the cooling needed and especially on my bare arms that rub against the vest.  It does cool well.  To maximize the cooling effect, recharge it every 2.5 hours at minimum if you are using cold tap water like i do. (i want to freeze this or use ultra cold water).  If you don't, it gets a very humid feeling, at least for me in a warehouse where temps average 90degrees plus right now.the more you soak it, the better it is.  The colder the water is, the better it is.It does feel heavy.. but only at first.  You get used to it quickly and appreciate the lower temp feeling.  It has made quite a difference in my quality of life chart working in a warehouse.  I wish we used these for all employees.I am happy with my purchase and do recommend it to others with a few cautions as explained above.Tho it does feel a bit like wearing a wet t-shirt at times.4/5 stars.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 10 June 2011

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: This thing is a life saver. I was dying on a motorcycle ride out to Ottawa last summer with temperatures between 30-35C. I put this on and my temperature instantly dropped. Thing is you really must have it exposed to the wind. If you wear it under a jacket, the upper chest part will dry out leaving the bottom permanently moist. The only reason it doesnt get 5 stars is it leaks and the water eventually finds its way to the bottom of the vest where its not cooling much anymore.I bought a medium and it's slightly baggy on me: you want it as tight as comfortable for it to work best. I'm 5'9" around 170lbs.I'm glad this is a part of my permanent motorcycle gear selection.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 17 December 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Arrivato nei tempi previsti. Lo uso per turismo sotto un giubbotto da moto con abondanti parti a rete e nel caldo torrido e in viaggio si sente il beneficio.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Italy on 18 September 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I do think they lose their cooling effectiveness as the summer goes on. I notice the vest is considerably lighter, so the little cooling granules are used up or possibly squeezed out by then. I get it as wet as possible and just try to barely squeeze out the excess water so that I don't leave a water trail from the sink to my work site (which is actually my car---I also don't really want my seat soaking wet...just me!). I am a mail carrier so my air conditioner doesn't help much in the summer when we work with the window open. These vests are far superior to the ice vests I was using as I can just carry a bottle of water and refresh it quickly. I carry a 6packsize cooler full of water and just dunk it in there every few hours and keep on moving!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 June 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: The 3x is actually quite big. I should have got the 2x for a snug fit. As it is a vest. It gets heavy but worth it.  I put mine in chilled water and then put in deep freezer.It should be noted that this does have a slime feel to it. In 30 degrees of hotness in my workplace the vest deep frozen holds its coolness for about an hour. Then I freeze again for 15 minutes.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 27 May 2021

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Positiv : Hält was sie verspricht.Negativ: Wird durch das Wasser sehr schwer.Verliert das Wasser nach und nach wodurch man vom Rücken an Abwärts komplett nass wird.Also eher nichts wenn man sich damit viel bewegen muss.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 21 July 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: je l'ai acheté pour mon père qui travaille dans une usine très chaude ! il aime, ça rafraichit ! je n'y croyais pas, certes c'est pas la clim, mais quand on bosse dehors ou en usine c'est ESSENTIEL IMMPOSSIBLE DE NE PAS L'AVOIR !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in France on 23 June 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: When wet ,  This item is very heavy. It did produce noticeable cooling and I was glad to have it. The size I chose was too large but I ordered the  largest one .
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Hallo, eine Kühlweste sollte kühlen und das tut Sie. Die Weste ist sehr angenehm zu tragen. Die Passform entspricht den normalen Größen.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 2 June 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: May wan to size down.  This is a great  cooling vest. I had to wear a shirt over it to keep the vest plastered to my body because it was too big when doused in cold water.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 19 August 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: this works!  A bit of trial and error for me (the first few times I did not blot enuf = my clothes got wet, but since I was in my backyard in 100 degree heat, I didnt' care.  For out in public at friend's houses for example, I had to learn how to better blot.  It definitely doesn't get me cold, but it does help keep me cool for about 3 hours in 90+ degree weather.  The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars (and perhaps I'm just not realistic), I would be ecstatic if this actually got colder than it does.  O well, I'm happy w/ this as I'm not aware of anything else (w/in a reasonable price point) that would do a better job.  O and I recommended this to my Dad who preaches as a deacon in a church that while big, doesn't get very cool up in the alter area and he is thrilled too - he wears it over his shirt, but under his vestments (he got the beige color) and says it really helps him.  BTW - the customer service for Ergodyne (a local company for me) is wonderful - I had a question about sizing and the gal I called in customer service was gracious and extremely helpful!  Her advice helped me to choose the right size the 1st time around :)
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2012

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Being *EXTREMELY* sensitive to heat, and working outside these days to rebuild the backyard deck, I had rivers of sweat pouring down my eyes, blinding me in minutes. Today, in another 35C heat day, with this vest, I was as cool as a 'The Dude' Leboswki.On the down side, your clothes will be wet.On the plus side, you will survive the heat !
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 4 July 2018

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Excellent Product. I'm pretty sure this is the same manufacturer that makes cooling vests for Sedici (motorcycle brand) ORDER DOWN A SIZE! I'm 5'9 L and an XL with "slim fit" shirts. I trusted the reviews and ordered down a size.. the medium fit PERFECTLY.It's incredible what a difference this jacket made for me. For my motorcycle people: YOU NEED THIS! It fit perfectly in my suit and did not restrict movement or make me feel uncomfortable. Jacket lasts about 40 minutes before you need to toss it back into your ice chest (which is PERFECT!) Make sure it's soaked in water or else your body won't be able to transfer heat to the jacket as efficiently.I was hydrating as frequently as I would with a normal trackday and I could barely break a sweat in 90 degree weather. I didn't wear the jacket for one of the sessions...Suddenly I was extremely uncomfortable I had sweat running down my eyes.stop doubting and buy!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 6 June 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Yes, there are probably better options out on the market but, for the price, this vest works as described. I think they are a little larger than posted…l see where folks get them wet and put them in the fridge, before using them. We don’t have that luxury when your riding 450 miles in 100 degree dry heat for 7-8 hours a day. In this type of weather, l was stopping every 3 hours and refuel the bike and rewatering the vest… The lime yellow is very bright and noticeable, good for visibility by others. The vest keeps me alert and comfortable too… well made and affordable..
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: High quality materials.  Absorbs a lot of water without being heavy or awkward.  Holds onto moisture but dries completely. Instantly cools the body like jumping into water... So I would day it will buy an hour in the Okanagan Sun where it is dry but very very hot.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 3 May 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I use this for woodworking in my garage during the summer in Tucson. This plus a bucket of ice water to recharge and a fan works pretty good to stay cool. Three stars because it seems to leak some of the gel every time I soak it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 November 2019

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I was not impressed. Wetting the vest down with cold water didn't keep me any cooler. I even went to the extreme and placed it in my freezer. Once it was frozen, the coolnest only lasted for about 20 minutes. The vest also adds a few pounds to your burden of having to wear extra weight in the heat. I will be returning it.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 5 July 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I bought this for my husband who works outside in the Texas heat. He tried it a couple of times and doesn't like it. If it's excessively hot, 100+, this really won't help. It might be effective in less hot and humid climates. Not a bad product just didn't work for him.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 24 September 2023

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Utilisé pour rouler en moto à des températures >40°C.Double avantage, ça la peau humidifié dans des zones ultra sec. Et ça rafraîchit vraiment l'air porté sous ma veste de moto d'été.Attention, comme marqué dans d'autres avis, aux premières utilisation ça peut tâcher (attention au blanc).Et ça taille vraiment très grand. Ce Large équivaut un XXL en Europe.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 6 August 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: I thought the vest may have a special absorbent liner between the outer and inner shell, but appears to be only 2 layers of fabric. Hence it does weep considerably after being soaked and wrung and the water travels to the lower parts. In retrospect any soaked fabric vest would have the same effect. It does fit well and comfortable and does cool by keeping your T-shirt soaked - which isn't a bad thing when you're sweating anyways.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Canada on 28 October 2017

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Nach dem eintauchen in Wasser wirkt die Weste deutlich nass und gibt die Feuchtigkeit nach innen und aussen ab. Wechselklamotten mitnehmen..
ReviewDate: Reviewed in Germany on 19 May 2022

ProductName: Ergodyne Chill-Its Evaporative Cooling Vest
Review: Te deja todo mojado y terminas resfriado

Review: Husband says it really helped him on his 95 degree plus summer rides!  It was a little heavier than he thought it would be but very valuable for traveling by motorcycle across country.

Review: Hubby needed a new jacket.  He didn't have a decent spring/fall option in the closet.I ordered this London Fog jacket because I'm a huge fan of the brand.  I wasn't disappointed.  I ordered a large tall because he's 6'4", with a 36 in sleeve.  Finding clothes that fit him can be difficult, so I crossed my fingers and hoped for the best.It was a hit!  The jacket, and sleeves, fit beautifully.  It has enough room to wear a sweater under it, without feeling tight, but doesn't look baggy over a lightweight shirt.  The price was excellent, so that was a bonus.London Fog has always had a reputation for quality, and its never disappointed me.  I expect him to get several years of use out of this particular purchase.

Review: It got real cold in November and I realized my big size parka jacket was falling apart and my windbreaker was too small, especially when I’m carrying my licensed CCW.Ordered this in 4XL and a big, fluffy parka in 5XL ( a hunch and I was right, it was junk and didn’t fit at 5xl and back to China it goes )Showed up in 2 or 3 days and is nice quality, very roomy, even carrying my Glock,,, the parka finally showed up, 8 weeks later— and winter is almost over! Damn Amazon need to tell the truth about when a product is being mailed from China  and will take months to arrive THAT IS NOT FOR THIS ITEM- it showed up in 2 or 3 days!It is a bit weird in that the lining is loosely attached,, almost like it’s removable. I need to look into it a bit.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2023

ProductName: LONDON FOG Men's Auburn Zip-Front Golf Jacket (Regular & Big-Tall Sizes), Black, 3X-Large Big

ProductName: LONDON FOG Men's Auburn Zip-Front Golf Jacket (Regular & Big-Tall Sizes), Black, 3X-Large Big

ProductName: LONDON FOG Men's Auburn Zip-Front Golf Jacket (Regular & Big-Tall Sizes), Black, 3X-Large Big
Review: Needed something other than a hoodie.  It doesn't often get cold enough that a hoodie doesn't do it, but my weather resistant nylon shell jacket that I'd had for 20+ years finally needed to go.This is a good one.  Sheds rain well enough that I don't get soaked between the truck and wherever I'm going into, it fits right, and it has a ton of pockets.Not crazy that it has 2 side pockets on each side, one with a zipper and one without but I just zipped up the zipper pockets and now I don't have to check both pockets when I stick my phone or keys in a side pocket.I'd buy it again and I'm pretty picky.  I have huge shoulders and the sleeves on this one are actually long enough without being stupid long.I'm a little over 6 ft tall, about 270 and most of my height is in my torso.
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 25 January 2023

ProductName: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Polar Fleece Vest
Review: So my husband was hesitant to get one of these fleece vests because it’s associated with hedge fund managers….& he’s a hedge fund manager so he didn’t want to look like an idiot trying to be part of a club, so to speak. We live in Cali though & he needed something that would keep him warm on cool days without being too hot. He also needed something where he could really move in because he helps our son practice his baseball & he’s always throwing a ball-which isn’t easy with his typical jackets. He wanted something classic looking enough that he could show up to a casual meeting & still look good. So I bought it for him for Christmas. I’m still getting thank yous from my husband. He lives in this thing, absolutely loves it. He says it’s incredibly comfortable & perfect for cool weather. It checks every box. He also likes the simplicity of the look, the rich navy color. Tommy Hilfiger always puts out well made products and this was no exception. Fantastic!! Highly recommended!
ReviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on 13 February 2022
